GR14ruphbr_u:9: tasya hareḥ pada-kamalaṃ vande caitanya-devasya // RBhrs_1,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:15: sphuratu sanātana suciraṃ tava bhakti-rasāmṛtāmbhodhiḥ // RBhrs_1,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:17: ajñenāpi mayāsya kriyate suhṛdām pramodāya // RBhrs_1,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:19: catvārah khalu vakṣyante bhāgāḥ pūrvādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_1,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:23: bhāvāśritā tṛtīyā ca turyā prema-nirūpikā // RBhrs_1,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:24: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:25: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam // RBhrs_1,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:32: ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame // RBhrs_1,1.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:34: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // RBhrs_1,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:35: sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ // RBhrs_1,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:41: kleśās tu pāpaṃ tad-bījam avidyā ceti te tridhā // RBhrs_1,1.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:43: aprārabdhaṃ bhavet pāpaṃ prārabdhaṃ ceti tad dvidhā // RBhrs_1,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:53: kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt // RBhrs_1,1.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:55: durjāty-ārambhakaṃ pāpaṃ yat syāt prārabdham eva tat // RBhrs_1,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:68: sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam // RBhrs_1,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:71: avidyāṃ nirdahaty āśu dāva-jvāleva pannagīm // RBhrs_1,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:74: sadguṇāḥ sukham ity-ādīny ākhyātāni manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_1,1.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:77: yenārcito haris tena tarpitāni jaganty api /
GR14ruphbr_u:78: rajyanti jantavas tatra jangamāḥ sthāvarā api // RBhrs_1,1.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:86: sukhaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ brāhmam aiśvaraṃ ceti tat tridhā // RBhrs_1,1.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:88: siddhayaḥ paramāścaryā bhuktir muktiś ca śāśvatī /
GR14ruphbr_u:89: nityaṃ ca paramānando bhaved govinda-bhaktitaḥ // RBhrs_1,1.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:91: bhūyo 'pi yāce deveśa tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me /
GR14ruphbr_u:92: yā mokṣānta-caturvarga phaladā sukhadā latā // RBhrs_1,1.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:95: puruṣārthās tu catvārās tṛṇāyante samantataḥ // RBhrs_1,1.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:98: bhuktyaś cādbhutās tasyāś ceṭikāvad anuvratāḥ // RBhrs_1,1.34 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:101: hariṇā cāśvadeyeti dvidhā sā syāt sudurlabhā // RBhrs_1,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:106: rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:107: daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:108: astv evam aṅga bhajatāṃ bhagavān mukundo
GR14ruphbr_u:109: muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam // RBhrs_1,1.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:115: sukhāni goṣpadāyante brāhmāṇy api jagad-guro // RBhrs_1,1.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:118: kurvanti kṛtinaḥ kecit catur-vargaṃ tṛṇopamam // RBhrs_1,1.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:123: na sādhyati mām yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava /
GR14ruphbr_u:124: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā // RBhrs_1,1.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:131: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam // RBhrs_1,1.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:134: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā // RBhrs_1,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:142: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā // RBhrs_1,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:145: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā // RBhrs_1,2.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:146: sā bhaktiḥ saptama-skandhe bhaṅgyā devarṣiṇoditā // RBhrs_1,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:148: tasmāt kenāpy upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet // RBhrs_1,2.4 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:149: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā // RBhrs_1,2.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:152: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:154: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:155: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaś ca smartavyaś cecchatābhayam // RBhrs_1,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:157: smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit /
GR14ruphbr_u:158: sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:159: ity asau syād vidhir nityaḥ sarva-varṇāśramādiṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:164: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak // RBhrs_1,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:165: ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:166: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:169: arcann ubhyataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām // RBhrs_1,2.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:171: surarṣe vihitā śāstre harim uddiśya yā kriyā /
GR14ruphbr_u:172: saiva bhaktir iti proktā tayā bhaktiḥ parā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:175: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau // RBhrs_1,2.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:178: na nirviṇṇo nātisakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhidaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:179: uttamo madhyamaś ca syāt kaniṣṭhaś ceti sa tridhā // RBhrs_1,2.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:181: śāstre yuktau ca nipuṇaḥ sarvathā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:182: prauḍha-śraddho 'dhikārī yaḥ sa bhaktāv uttamo mataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:184: yaḥ śāstrādiṣv anipuṇaḥ śraddhāvān sa tu madhyamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:186: yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate // RBhrs_1,2.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:188: madhye yasmin bhagavatah kṛpā syāt tat-priyasya vā // RBhrs_1,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:190: yathebhaḥ śaunakādiś ca dhruvaḥ sa ca catuḥsanaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:192: tāvad bhakti-sukhasyātra katham abhyudayo bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:193: tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa gatim aṇvīm anicchataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:194: bhaktir hṛta-manaḥ-prāṇān premṇā tān kurute janān // RBhrs_1,2.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:199: anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte // RBhrs_1,2.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:201: eṣāṃ mokṣāya bhaktānāṃ na kadācit spṛhā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:215: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:219: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:220: kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt // RBhrs_1,2.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:222: na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin
GR14ruphbr_u:225: vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:241: ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārtha-kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:243: tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam ananta ādye
GR14ruphbr_u:244: kiṃ tair guṇa-vyatikarād iha ye sva-siddhāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:246: sāraṃ juṣāṃ caraṇayor upagāyatāṃ naḥ // RBhrs_1,2.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:248: pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgā
GR14ruphbr_u:250: kāla-grastaṃ kiyad idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
GR14ruphbr_u:251: muktis teṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim // RBhrs_1,2.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:259: necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam // RBhrs_1,2.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:268: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
GR14ruphbr_u:271: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama /
GR14ruphbr_u:272: vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam // RBhrs_1,2.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:279: naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta /
GR14ruphbr_u:280: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye // RBhrs_1,2.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:282: varaṃ deva mokṣaṃ na mokṣāvadhiṃ vā
GR14ruphbr_u:285: sadā me manasy avirāstāṃ kim anyaiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:289: na mokṣe graho me 'sti dāmodareha // RBhrs_1,2.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:291: na dharma kāmam arthaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā varadeśvara /
GR14ruphbr_u:292: prārthaye tava pādābje dāsyam evābhikāmaye // RBhrs_1,2.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:294: punaḥ punar varān ditsur viṣṇur muktiṃ na yācitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:295: bhaktir eva vṛtā yena prahlādaṃ taṃ namāmy ahaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:296: yadṛcchayā labdham api viṣṇor dāśarathes tu yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:297: naicchan mokṣaṃ vinā dāsyaṃ tasmai hanumate namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:300: bhavān prabhur ahaṃ dāsa iti yatra vilupyate // RBhrs_1,2.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:305: icchāmi hi mahābhāga kāruṇyaṃ tava suvrata // RBhrs_1,2.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:308: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune // RBhrs_1,2.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:311: bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:313: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame /
GR14ruphbr_u:314: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim ittham-bhūta-guṇo hariḥ // RBhrs_1,2.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:316: sālokyādis tathāpy atra bhaktyā nātivirudhyate // RBhrs_1,2.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:318: sālokyādir dvidhā tatra nādyā sevā-juṣaṃ matā // RBhrs_1,2.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:320: naivāṅgīkurvate jātu muktiṃ pañca-vidhām api // RBhrs_1,2.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:322: yeṣāṃ śrīśa-prasādo 'pi mano hartuṃ na śaknuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:327: dṛṣtāntitā vaśiṣṭhena hari-bhaktir nṛpaṃ prati // RBhrs_1,2.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:329: sarve 'dhikāriṇo hy atra hari-bhaktau yathā nṛpa // RBhrs_1,2.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:332: samprāpya vaiṣṇavīṃ dīkṣāṃ dīkṣitā iva sambabhuḥ // RBhrs_1,2.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:335: na karmaṇām akaraṇād eṣa bhakty-adhikāriṇām // RBhrs_1,2.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:337: iti vaiṣṇava-śāstrāṇāṃ rahasyaṃ tad-vidāṃ matam // RBhrs_1,2.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:339: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sā guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:340: viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:344: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:347: ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān /
GR14ruphbr_u:348: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:351: na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan /
GR14ruphbr_u:355: sarva-dharman parityājya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GR14ruphbr_u:356: ahaṃ tvāṃ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā sucaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:359: tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam // RBhrs_1,2.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:366: kintu tāni prasiddhāni nirdiśyante yathāmati // RBhrs_1,2.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:369: ekaṃ karmātra vidvadbhir ekaṃ bhakty-aṅgam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:374: nivāso dvārakādau ca gaṅgāder api sannidhau // RBhrs_1,2.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:377: eṣām atra daśāṅgānāṃ bhavet prārambha-rupatā // RBhrs_1,2.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:389: nirmālyādeś ca tasyāgre tāṇḍavaṃ daṇḍavan-natiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:391: arcanaṃ paricaryā ca gītaṃ saṅkīrtanaṃ japaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:395: smṛtir dhyānaṃ tathā dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam // RBhrs_1,2.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:397: sarvathā śaraṇāpattis tadīyānāṃ ca sevanam // RBhrs_1,2.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:401: śraddhā viśeṣataḥ prītiḥ śrī-mūrter aṅghri-sevane // RBhrs_1,2.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:403: sajātīyāśaye snigdhe sādhau saṅgaḥ svato vare // RBhrs_1,2.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:406: nikhila-śraiṣṭhya-bodhāya punar apy atra kīrtanam // RBhrs_1,2.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:412: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam /
GR14ruphbr_u:413: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam // RBhrs_1,2.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:417: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ // RBhrs_1,2.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:424: sa mṛgyaḥ śreyasāṃ hetuḥ panthāḥ santāpa-varjitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:425: anvāpta-śramaṃ pūrve yena santaḥ pratasthire // RBhrs_1,2.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:428: aikāntikī harer bhaktir utpātāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_1,2.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:430: vastutas tu tathā naiva yad aśāstrīyatekṣyate // RBhrs_1,2.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:433: acirād eva sarvārthaḥ sidhyaty eṣām abhīpsitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:437: harim uddiśya bhogāni kāle tyaktavatas tava /
GR14ruphbr_u:441: saṃvatsaraṃ vā ṣaṇmāsān māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:442: dvārakā-vāsinaḥ sarve narā nāryaś caturbhujāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:446: diviṣṭhā yatra paśyanti sarvān eva caturbhujān // RBhrs_1,2.106 //
GR14ruphbr_u:452: kas tāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:455: yāvatā syāt sva-nirvāhaḥ svīkuryāt tāvad artha-vit /
GR14ruphbr_u:456: ādhikye nyūnatāyāṃ ca cyavate paramārthataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:464: pūjitāḥ praṇatāḥ dhyātāḥ kṣapayanti nṝṇām agham // RBhrs_1,2.110 //
GR14ruphbr_u:474: na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān naivābhyased bahūn /
GR14ruphbr_u:475: na vyākhyām upayuñjīta nārambhān ārabhet kvacit // RBhrs_1,2.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:479: aviklava-matir bhūtvā harim eva dhiyā smaret // RBhrs_1,2.114 //
GR14ruphbr_u:483: kathaṃ tatra mukundasya sphūrti-sambhāvanā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.115 ///
GR14ruphbr_u:490: piteva putraṃ karuṇo nodvejayati yo janam /
GR14ruphbr_u:491: viśuddhasya hṛṣīkeśas tūrṇaṃ tasya prasīdati // RBhrs_1,2.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:495: vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:498: harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipadapāṃśulaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:499: nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:500: nāmno hi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.120 //
GR14ruphbr_u:503: nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śrṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:504: tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yāty adhaḥ sukṛtāc cyutaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:510: te vaiṣṇavā bhuvanam āśu pavitrayanti // RBhrs_1,2.122 //
GR14ruphbr_u:517: sa loka-pāvano bhutvā tasya lokam avāpnuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:521: ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayemahi // RBhrs_1,2.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:523: kṛṣṇottīrṇaṃ tu nirmālyaṃ yasyāṅgaṃ spṛśate mune /
GR14ruphbr_u:524: sarva-rogais tathā pāpair mukto bhavati nārada // RBhrs_1,2.126 //
GR14ruphbr_u:527: yo nṛtyati prahṛṣṭātmā bhāvair bahuṣu bhaktitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:528: sa nirdahati pāpāni manvantara-śateṣv api // RBhrs_1,2.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:540: yān ārūḍhaṃ puraḥ prekṣya samāyāntaṃ janārdanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:541: abhyutthānaṃ naraḥ kurvan pātayet sarva-kilbiṣam // RBhrs_1,2.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:544: viṣṇunaiva samāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapadādayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.131 //
GR14ruphbr_u:546: sthānaṃ tīrthaṃ gṛhaṃ cāsya tatra tīrthe gatir yathā // RBhrs_1,2.132 //
GR14ruphbr_u:549: slāghyau tāv eva caraṇau yau hares tīrtha-gāminau // RBhrs_1,2.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:552: na bhūyaḥ praviśen mātuḥ kukṣi-kārāgṛhaṃ sudhīḥ // RBhrs_1,2.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:555: tad evāvartanaṃ tasya punar nāvartate bhave // RBhrs_1,2.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:557: catur-vāraṃ bhramībhis tu jagat sarvaṃ carācaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:564: sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ mūlaṃ tāc-caraṇārcanaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:566: śrī-viṣṇor arcanaṃ ye tu prakurvanti narā bhuvi /
GR14ruphbr_u:567: te yānti śāśvataṃ viṣṇor ānandaṃ paramaṃ padam // RBhrs_1,2.139 //
GR14ruphbr_u:572: muhūrtaṃ vā muhūrtārdhaṃ yas tiṣṭhed dhari-mandire /
GR14ruphbr_u:573: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ kim u śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.141 //
GR14ruphbr_u:580: na tāni likhitāny atra grantha-bāhulya-bhītitaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.143 //
GR14ruphbr_u:583: hareḥ sālokyam āpnoti rudra-gānādhikaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.144 //
GR14ruphbr_u:588: kṛṣṇeti maṅgalaṃ nāma yasya vāci pravartate /
GR14ruphbr_u:598: idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā
GR14ruphbr_u:603: mantrasya sulaghūccāro japa ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_1,2.149 //
GR14ruphbr_u:605: kṛṣṇāya nama ity eṣa mantraḥ sarvārtha-sādhakaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:609: harim uddiśya yat kiñcit kṛtaṃ vijñāpanaṃ girā /
GR14ruphbr_u:610: mokṣa-dvārārgalān mokṣas tenaiva vihitas tava // RBhrs_1,2.151 //
GR14ruphbr_u:612: ity ādir vividhā dhīraiḥ kṛṣṇe vijñaptir īritā // RBhrs_1,2.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:615: yuvatīnāṃ yathā yūni yūnāṃ ca yuvatau yathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:619: mat-tulyo nāsti pāpātmā nāparādhī ca kaścana /
GR14ruphbr_u:620: parihāre 'pi lajjā me kiṃ brūve puruṣottama // RBhrs_1,2.154 //
GR14ruphbr_u:623: kadā gambhīrayā vācā śriyā yukto jagat-pate /
GR14ruphbr_u:624: cāmara-vyagra-hastaṃ mām evaṃ kurv iti vakṣyasi // RBhrs_1,2.155 //
GR14ruphbr_u:634: stotraiḥ stavaś ca devāgre yaḥ stauti madhusūdanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:644: na dānaṃ na havir yeṣāṃ svādhyāyo na surārcanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:645: te 'pi pādodakaṃ pītvā prayānti paramāṃ gatim // RBhrs_1,2.161 //
GR14ruphbr_u:660: pāpa-bandhair vinirmuktaḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:663: vṛndāvane tu govindaṃ ye paśyanti vasundhare /
GR14ruphbr_u:664: na te yama-puraṃ yānti yānti puṇya-kṛtāṃ gatim // RBhrs_1,2.166 //
GR14ruphbr_u:668: dahaty āloka-mātreṇa viṣṇoḥ sārātrikaṃ mukham // RBhrs_1,2.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:672: devatānāṃ gaṇāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapacādayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.168 //
GR14ruphbr_u:675: pūjitaṃ pūjyamānaṃ vā yaḥ paśyed bhaktito harim // RBhrs_1,2.169 //
GR14ruphbr_u:681: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śrutvā mukto bhaven naraḥ // RBhrs_1,2.171 //
GR14ruphbr_u:686: tā ye pibanty avitṛṣo nṛpa gāḍha-karṇais
GR14ruphbr_u:699: jīveta yo mukti-pade sa dāya-bhāk // RBhrs_1,2.174 //
GR14ruphbr_u:701: yathā kathaṃ cin-manasā sambandhaḥ smṛtir ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:704: puruṣaṃ tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // RBhrs_1,2.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:706: prayāṇe cāprayāṇe ca yan-nāma smaratāṃ nṝṇām /
GR14ruphbr_u:707: sadyo naśyati pāpaugho namas tasmai cid-ātmane // RBhrs_1,2.177 //
GR14ruphbr_u:713: pāpino 'pi prasaṅgena vihitaṃ suhitaṃ param // RBhrs_1,2.179 //
GR14ruphbr_u:716: ye kurvanti sadā bhaktyā guṇānusmaraṇaṃ hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:717: prakṣīṇa-kaluṣaughās te praviśanti hareḥ padam // RBhrs_1,2.180 //
GR14ruphbr_u:721: dhyāyan hareś caritrāṇi lalitāni vimucyate // RBhrs_1,2.181 //
GR14ruphbr_u:725: pare vāṅ-manasā'gamyaṃ taṃ sākṣāt pratipedire // RBhrs_1,2.182 //
GR14ruphbr_u:727: dāsyaṃ karmārpaṇaṃ tasya kaiṅkaryam api sarvathā // RBhrs_1,2.183 //
GR14ruphbr_u:730: bhaved bhāgavato dharmas tat-karma kimutārpitam // RBhrs_1,2.184 //
GR14ruphbr_u:732: itīdaṃ dvividhaṃ kṛṣṇe vaiṣṇavair dāsyam arpitam // RBhrs_1,2.185 //
GR14ruphbr_u:734: tad-arpitaṃ harau dāsyam iti kaiścid udīryate // RBhrs_1,2.186 //
GR14ruphbr_u:736: īhā yasya harer dāsye karmaṇā manasā girā /
GR14ruphbr_u:737: nikhilāsv apy avasthāsu jīvan-muktaḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.187 //
GR14ruphbr_u:739: viśvāso mitra-vṛttiś ca sakhyaṃ dvividham īritam // RBhrs_1,2.188 //
GR14ruphbr_u:742: pratijñā tava govinda na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:743: iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya prāṇān saṃdhārayāmy aham // RBhrs_1,2.189 //
GR14ruphbr_u:748: lava-nimiṣārdham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāgryaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.190 //
GR14ruphbr_u:750: aṅgatvam asya viśvāsa-viśeṣasya tu keśave // RBhrs_1,2.191 //
GR14ruphbr_u:752: paricaryā parāḥ kecit prāsādeṣu ca śerate /
GR14ruphbr_u:753: manuṣyam iva taṃ draṣṭuṃ vyāvahartuṃ ca bandhuvat // RBhrs_1,2.192 //
GR14ruphbr_u:755: mārga-dvayena caitena sādhyā sakhya-ratir matā // RBhrs_1,2.193 //
GR14ruphbr_u:763: dehy-ahantāspadaṃ kaiścid dehaḥ kaiścin mamatva-bhāk // RBhrs_1,2.195 //
GR14ruphbr_u:770: cintāṃ kuryān na rakṣāyai vikrītasya yathā paśoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:771: tathārpayan harau dehaṃ viramed asya rakṣanāt // RBhrs_1,2.197 //
GR14ruphbr_u:773: keṣāṃcid eva dhīrāṇāṃ labhate sādhanārhatām // RBhrs_1,2.198 //
GR14ruphbr_u:776: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:777: tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // RBhrs_1,2.199 //
GR14ruphbr_u:780: laukikī vaidikī vāpi yā kriyā kriyate mune /
GR14ruphbr_u:781: hari-sevānukūlaiva sā kāryā bhaktim icchatā // RBhrs_1,2.200 //
GR14ruphbr_u:784: tavāsmīti vadan vācā tathaiva manasā vidan /
GR14ruphbr_u:785: tat-sthānam āśritas tanvā modate śaraṇāgataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.201 //
GR14ruphbr_u:788: iti yaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptas taṃ kleśād uddharāmy aham // RBhrs_1,2.202 //
GR14ruphbr_u:794: nyastā tac-caraṇe vimukti-phaladā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.203 //
GR14ruphbr_u:796: dṛṣtā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kīrtitā namitā stutā /
GR14ruphbr_u:797: ropitā sevitā nityaṃ pūjitā tulasī śubhā // RBhrs_1,2.204 //
GR14ruphbr_u:798: navadhā tulasīṃ devīṃ ye bhajanti dine dine /
GR14ruphbr_u:799: yuga-koṭi-sahasrāṇi te vasanti harer gṛhe // RBhrs_1,2.205 //
GR14ruphbr_u:801: śāstram atra samākhyātaṃ yad bhakti-pratipādakam // RBhrs_1,2.206 //
GR14ruphbr_u:803: vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:804: dhanyās te mānavā loke tesāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati // RBhrs_1,2.207 //
GR14ruphbr_u:805: vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye 'rcayanti gṛhe narāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:807: tiṣṭhate vaiṣṇavaṃ śāstraṃ likhitaṃ yasya mandire /
GR14ruphbr_u:808: tatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ svayaṃ vasati nārada // RBhrs_1,2.209 //
GR14ruphbr_u:811: tad-rasāmṛta-tṛptasya nānyatra syād ratiḥ kvacit // RBhrs_1,2.210 //
GR14ruphbr_u:814: mathurāṃ ca parityajya yo 'nyatra kurute ratim /
GR14ruphbr_u:815: mūḍho bhramati saṃsāre mohitā mama māyayā // RBhrs_1,2.211 //
GR14ruphbr_u:819: śrutā smṛtā kīrtitā ca vāñchitā prekṣitā gatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:820: spṛṣṭā śritā sevitā ca mathurābhīṣṭadā nṛṇām /
GR14ruphbr_u:821: iti khyātaṃ purāṇeṣu na vistāra-bhiyocyate // RBhrs_1,2.213 //
GR14ruphbr_u:825: tasmāt parataraṃ devi tadīyānāṃ samarcanam // RBhrs_1,2.214 //
GR14ruphbr_u:828: rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.215 //
GR14ruphbr_u:831: gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣtaś cet tad-aghaṃ kutaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.216 //
GR14ruphbr_u:833: yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:836: ye me bhakta-janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāś ca te janāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:837: mad-bhaktānāṃ ca ye bhaktās te me bhaktatamā matāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.218 //
GR14ruphbr_u:839: prāyas tāvanti tad-bhakta-bhakter api budhā viduḥ // RBhrs_1,2.219 //
GR14ruphbr_u:842: yaḥ karoti mahīpāla harer gehe mahotsavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:843: tasyāpi bhavati nityaṃ hari-loke mahotsava // RBhrs_1,2.220 //
GR14ruphbr_u:847: tasyāyaṃ tādṛśo māsaḥ svalpam apy uru-kārakaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.221 //
GR14ruphbr_u:850: bhuktiṃ muktiṃ harir dadyād arcito 'nyatra sevinām /
GR14ruphbr_u:851: bhaktiṃ tu na dadāty eva yato vaśyakarī hareḥ // RBhrs_1,2.222 //
GR14ruphbr_u:852: sā tv añjasā harer bhaktir labhyate kārttike naraiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:856: yasmin dine prasūteyaṃ devakī tvāṃ janārdana /
GR14ruphbr_u:857: tad-dinaṃ brūhi vaikuṇṭha kurmas te tatra cotsavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:858: tena samyak-prapannānāṃ prasādaṃ kuru keśavaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.224 //
GR14ruphbr_u:862: bhaktis tasmai pradātavyā na tu muktiḥ kadācana // RBhrs_1,2.225 //
GR14ruphbr_u:868: muhur aho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.226 //
GR14ruphbr_u:871: gṛhita-cetā rājarṣe ākhyānaṃ yad adhītavān // RBhrs_1,2.227 //
GR14ruphbr_u:877: yasya yat-saṅgatiḥ puṃso maṇivat syāt sa tad-guṇaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:878: sva-kūlarddhyai tato dhīmān sva-yūthyān eva saṃśrayet // RBhrs_1,2.229 //
GR14ruphbr_u:882: yogināṃ nṛpa nirṇītaṃ harer nāmānukīrtanaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.230 //
GR14ruphbr_u:884: gītvā ca mama nāmāni vicaren mama sannidhau /
GR14ruphbr_u:885: iti bravīmi te satyaṃ krīto 'haṃ tasya cārjuna // RBhrs_1,2.231 //
GR14ruphbr_u:888: tan-mukhe hari-nāmāni sadā tiṣṭhanti bhārata // RBhrs_1,2.232 //
GR14ruphbr_u:892: ataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-nāmādi na bhaved grāhyaṃ indriyaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:893: sevonmukhe hi jihvādau svayam eva sphuraty adaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.234 //
GR14ruphbr_u:897: muktaiḥ prārthyā harer bhaktir mathurāyāṃ tu labhyate // RBhrs_1,2.235 //
GR14ruphbr_u:898: tri-vargadā kāmināṃ yā mumukṣūṇāṃ ca mokṣadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:899: bhaktīcchor bhaktidā kas tāṃ mathurāṃ nāśrayed budhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.236 //
GR14ruphbr_u:900: aho madhu-purī dhanyā vaikuṇṭhāc ca garīyasī /
GR14ruphbr_u:901: dinam ekaṃ nivāsena harau bhaktiḥ prajāyate // RBhrs_1,2.237 //
GR14ruphbr_u:903: yatra svalpo 'pi sambandhaḥ sad-dhiyāṃ bhāva-janmane // RBhrs_1,2.238 //
GR14ruphbr_u:908: mā prekṣiṣṭhās tava yadi sakhe bandhu-sange 'sti raṅgaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.239 //
GR14ruphbr_u:913: yad garhantaḥ sukhamayam amī mokṣam apy ākṣipanti // RBhrs_1,2.240 //
GR14ruphbr_u:916: skhalann antaḥ-phullo dadhad atipṛthuṃ vepathum api /
GR14ruphbr_u:917: dṛśoḥ kakṣāṃ yāvan mama sa puruṣaḥ ko 'py upayayau
GR14ruphbr_u:918: na jāte kiṃ tāvan matir iha gṛhe nābhiramate // RBhrs_1,2.241 //
GR14ruphbr_u:928: manasi kam api bhāvaṃ kānana-śrīs tanoti // RBhrs_1,2.243 //
GR14ruphbr_u:930: bhāvaṃ tad-viṣayaṃ cāpi yā sahaiva prakāśayet // RBhrs_1,2.244 //
GR14ruphbr_u:931: keṣāṃcit kvacid aṅgānāṃ yat kṣudraṃ śrūyate phalaṃ /
GR14ruphbr_u:932: bahir-mukha-pravṛttyaitat kintu mukhyaṃ phalaṃ ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.245 //
GR14ruphbr_u:933: saṃmataṃ bhakti-vijñānāṃ bhakty-aṅgatvaṃ na karmaṇām // RBhrs_1,2.246 //
GR14ruphbr_u:935: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:936: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate // RBhrs_1,2.247 //
GR14ruphbr_u:938: īṣat prathamam eveti nāṅgatvam ucitaṃ tayoḥ // RBhrs_1,2.248 //
GR14ruphbr_u:939: yad ubhe citta-kāṭhinya-hetū prāyaḥ satāṃ mate /
GR14ruphbr_u:943: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha // RBhrs_1,2.250 //
GR14ruphbr_u:946: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgya taś ca yat /
GR14ruphbr_u:947: yogena dāna dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api // RBhrs_1,2.252 //
GR14ruphbr_u:949: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // RBhrs_1,2.253 //
GR14ruphbr_u:950: rucim udvahatas tatra janasya bhajane hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:951: viṣayeṣu gariṣṭho 'pi rāgaḥ prāyo vilīyate // RBhrs_1,2.254 //
GR14ruphbr_u:953: nirbandhaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhe yuktaṃ vairāgyam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.255 //
GR14ruphbr_u:955: mumukṣubhiḥ parityāgo vairāgyaṃ phalgu kathyate // RBhrs_1,2.256 //
GR14ruphbr_u:959: spaṣṭatārthaṃ punar api tad evedaṃ nirākṛtaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.258 //
GR14ruphbr_u:961: vidūratvād uttamatā-hānyā tasyāś ca nāṅgatā // RBhrs_1,2.259 //
GR14ruphbr_u:963: vivekādīny ato 'mīṣām api nāṅgatvam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.260 //
GR14ruphbr_u:964: kṛṣṇonmukhaṃ svayaṃ yānti yamāḥ śaucādayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:965: ity eṣāṃ ca na yuktā syād bhakty-aṅgāntara-pātitā // RBhrs_1,2.261 //
GR14ruphbr_u:967: ete na hy adbhutā vyādha tavāhiṃsādayo guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:968: hari-bhaktau pravṛttā ye na te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.262 //
GR14ruphbr_u:976: śrī viṣṇoḥ śravaṇe parīkṣid abhavad vaiyāsakiḥ kīrtane
GR14ruphbr_u:977: prahlādaḥ smaraṇe tad-aṅghri-bhajane lakṣmīḥ pṛthuḥ pūjane /
GR14ruphbr_u:978: akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:979: sarvasvātma-nivedane balir abhūt kṛṣṇāptir eṣāṃ parā // RBhrs_1,2.265 //
GR14ruphbr_u:991: kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā
GR14ruphbr_u:994: vaidhi bhaktir iyaṃ kaiścan maryādā-mārga ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.269 //
GR14ruphbr_u:997: rāgātmikām anusṛtā yā sā rāgānugocyate // RBhrs_1,2.270 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1000: tan-mayī yā bhaved bhaktiḥ sātra rāgātmikoditā // RBhrs_1,2.272 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1001: sā kāmarūpā sambandha-rūpā ceti bhaved dvidhā // RBhrs_1,2.273 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1003: kāmād dveṣād bhayāt snehād yathā bhaktyeśvare manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1004: āveśya tad aghaṃ hitvā bahavas tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.274 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1005: gopyaḥ kāmād bhayāt kaṃso dveṣāc caidyādayo nṛpāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1006: sambandhād vṛṣṇayaḥ snehād yūyaṃ bhaktyā vayaṃ vibho // RBhrs_1,2.275 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1011: bhaktyā vayam iti vyaktaṃ vaidhī bhaktir udīritā // RBhrs_1,2.277 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1012: yad-arīṇāṃ priyāṇāṃ ca prāpyam ekam ivoditam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1014: brahmaṇy eva layaṃ yānti prāyeṇa ripavo hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1015: kecit prāpyāpi sārūpyābhāsaṃ majjanti tat-sukhe // RBhrs_1,2.279 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1017: siddha-lokas tu tamasaḥ pāre yatra vasanti hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:1018: siddhā brahma-sukhe magnā daityāś ca hariṇa hatāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.280 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1019: rāga-bandhena kenāpi taṃ bhajanto vrajanty amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:1020: aṅghri-padma-sudhāḥ prema-rūpās tasya priyā janāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.281 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1025: vayam api te samāḥ sama-dṛśo 'ṅghri-saroja-sudhāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.282 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1027: sā kāmarūpā sambhoga-tṛṣṇāṃ yā nayati svatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:1028: yad asyāṃ kṛṣṇa-saukhyārtham eva kevalam udyamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.283 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1030: āsāṃ prema-viśeṣo 'yaṃ prāptaḥ kām api mādhurīṃ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1031: tat-tat-krīḍā-nidānatvāt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.284 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1033: premaiva gopa-rāmāṇāṃ kāma ity agamat prathām // RBhrs_1,2.285 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1034: ity uddhavādayo 'py etaṃ vāñchati bhagavat-priyāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.286 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1035: kāma-prāyā ratiḥ kintu kubjāyām eva sammatā // RBhrs_1,2.287 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1042: rāgātmikāyā dvaividhyād dvidhā rāgānugā ca sā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1043: kāmānugā ca sambandhānugā ceti nigadyate // RBhrs_1,2.290 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1046: teṣāṃ bhāvāptaye lubdho bhaved atrādhikāravān // RBhrs_1,2.291 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1048: nātra śāstraṃ na yuktiṃ ca tal-lobhotpatti-lakṣaṇam // RBhrs_1,2.292 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1050: atra śāstraṃ tathā tarkam anukūlam apekṣate // RBhrs_1,2.293 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1051: kṛṣṇaṃ smaran janaṃ cāsya preṣṭhaṃ nija-samīhitam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1052: tat-tat-kathā-rataś cāsau kuryād vāsaṃ vraje sadā // RBhrs_1,2.294 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1056: yāny aṅgāni ca tāny atra vijñeyāni manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.296 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1062: śrī-mūrter mādhurīṃ prekṣya tat-tal-līlāṃ niśamya vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1064: purāṇe śruyate pādme puṃsam api bhaved iyam // RBhrs_1,2.300 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1067: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham // RBhrs_1,2.301 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1068: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule /
GR14ruphbr_u:1069: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt // RBhrs_1,2.302 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1070: riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1071: kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure // RBhrs_1,2.303 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1074: bhartāraṃ ca jagad-yoniṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ vibhum // RBhrs_1,2.304 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1076: sā sambandhānugā bhaktiḥ procyate sadbhir ātmani /
GR14ruphbr_u:1080: tathā hi śruyate śāstre kaścit kurupurī-sthitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1085: ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.308 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1092: rucibhiś citta-māsṛṇya-kṛd asau bhāva ucyate // RBhrs_1,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1094: premṇas tu prathamāvasthā bhāva ity abhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1101: vastutaḥ svayam āsvāda-svarūpaiva ratis tv asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:1105: ādyas tu prāyikas tatra dvitīyo viralodayaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1110: harāv āsaktim utpādya ratiṃ saṃjanayaty asau // RBhrs_1,3.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1115: priya-śravasy aṅga mamābhavad ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.9 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:1116: ratyā tu bhāva evātra na tu premābhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1117: mama bhaktiḥ pravṛtteti vakṣyate sa yad agrataḥ // RBhrs_1,3.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1128: purāṇe nātya-śāstre ca dvayos tu rati-bhāvayoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1129: samānārthatayā hy atra dvayam aikyena lakṣitam // RBhrs_1,3.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1131: itthaṃ manorathaṃ bālā kurvatī nṛtya utsukā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1132: hari-prītyā ca tāṃ sarvāṃ rātrim evātyavāhayat // RBhrs_1,3.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1141: dvijendra tava mayy astu bhaktir avyābhicāriṇī // RBhrs_1,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1147: prasāda āntaro yaḥ syāt sa hārda iti kathyate // RBhrs_1,3.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1153: guṇair alam asaṅkhyeyair mahātmyaṃ tasya sūcyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1154: vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1156: nisargaḥ saiva tenātra ratir naisargikī matā // RBhrs_1,3.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1158: aho dhanyo 'si devarṣe kṛpayā yasya tat-kṣaṇāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:1159: nīco 'py utpulako lebhe lubdhako ratim acyute // RBhrs_1,3.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1160: bhaktānāṃ bhedataḥ seyaṃ ratiḥ pañca-vidhā matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1161: agre vivicya vaktavyā tena nātra prapañcyate // RBhrs_1,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1163: āśā-bandhaḥ samutkaṇṭhā nāma-gāne sadā ruciḥ // RBhrs_1,3.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1165: ity ādayo 'nubhāvāḥ syur jāta-bhāvāṅkure jane // RBhrs_1,3.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1167: kṣobha-hetāv api prāpte kṣāntir akṣubhitātmatā // RBhrs_1,3.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1180: viraktir indriyārthānāṃ syād arocakatā svayaṃ // RBhrs_1,3.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1182: yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1187: harau ratiṃ vahann eṣa narendrāṇāṃ śikhā-maṇiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1188: bhikṣām aṭann ari-pure śvapākam api vandate // RBhrs_1,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1192: na premā śravaṇādi-bhaktir api vā yogo 'thavā vaiṣṇavo
GR14ruphbr_u:1193: jñānaṃ vā śubha-karma vā kiyad aho saj-jātir apy asti vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1195: he gopī-jana-vallabha vyathayate hā hā mad-āśaiva mām // RBhrs_1,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1200: ālolām anurāgiṇor nayanayor ārdrāṃ mṛdau jalpite /
GR14ruphbr_u:1202: āśāste mama locanaṃ vraja-śiśor-mūrtiṃ jagan-mohinīm // RBhrs_1,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1205: tava madhura-svara-kaṇṭhī gāyati nāmāvalīṃ bālā // RBhrs_1,3.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1211: ceto bata harati hanta kiṃ kurmaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1213: yathā padyāvalyām {*Not found in my edition.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:1217: ānandāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham // RBhrs_1,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1220: mumukṣu-prabhṛtīnāṃ ced bhaved eṣā ratir na hi // RBhrs_1,3.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1222: yā kṛṣṇenātigopyāśu bhajadbhyo 'pi na dīyate // RBhrs_1,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1224: hṛdaye sambhavaty eṣāṃ kathaṃ bhāgavatī ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1227: pratibimbas tathā cchāyā raty-ābhāso dvidhā mataḥ // RBhrs_1,3.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1237: rateś chāyā bhavet kiṃcit tat-sādṛśyāvalambinī // RBhrs_1,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1239: apy ānuṣaṅgikād eṣa kvacid ajñeṣv apīkṣyate // RBhrs_1,3.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1240: kintu bhāgyaṃ vinā nāsau bhāva-cchāyāpy udañcati /
GR14ruphbr_u:1241: yad abhyudayataḥ kṣemaṃ tatra syād uttarottaram // RBhrs_1,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1245: krameṇa kṣayam āpnoti kha-sthaḥ pūrṇa-śaśī yathā // RBhrs_1,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1248: ābhāsatāṃ ca śanakair nyūna-jātīyatām api // RBhrs_1,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1250: ābhāsatām asau kiṃ vā bhajanīyeśa-bhāvatām // RBhrs_1,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1251: ata eva kvacit teṣu navya-bhakteṣu dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1253: sādhanekṣāṃ vinā yasminn akasmād bhāva īkṣyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1256: yaḥ prathīyān bhaved bhāvaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇa-prasādajaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1257: jane cej jāta-bhāve 'pi vaiguṇyam iva dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1258: kāryā tathāpi nāsūyā kṛtārthaḥ sarvathaiva saḥ // RBhrs_1,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1265: uṣmāṇam api vamantī sudhāṃśu-koṭer api svādvī // RBhrs_1,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1270: bhāvaḥ sa eva sāndrātmā budhaiḥ premā nigadyate // RBhrs_1,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1274: bhaktiḥ premocyate bhīṣma-mukhyair yatra tu saṅgatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1276: bhāvottho 'ti-prasādotthaḥ śrī-harer iti sa dvidhā // RBhrs_1,4.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1288: na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1297: māhātmya-jñāna-yuktaś ca kevalaś ceti sa dvidhā // RBhrs_1,4.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1300: sneho bhaktir iti proktas tayā sārṣṭyādinānyathā // RBhrs_1,4.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1305: rāgānugāśritānāṃ tu prāyaśaḥ kevalo bhavet // RBhrs_1,4.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1307: tato 'nartha-nivṛttiḥ syāt tato niṣṭhā rucis tataḥ // RBhrs_1,4.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1309: sādhakānām ayaṃ premnaḥ prādurbhāve bhavet kramaḥ // RBhrs_1,4.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1311: antarvāṇībhir apy asya mudrā suṣṭhu sudurgamā // RBhrs_1,4.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1313: bhāvonmatto hareḥ kiñcin na veda sukham ātmanaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1314: dukhaṃ ceti maheśāni paramānanda āplutaḥ // RBhrs_1,4.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1315: premṇa eva vilāsatvād vairalyāt sādhakeṣv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:1316: atra snehādayo bhedā vivicya na hi śaṃsitāḥ // RBhrs_1,4.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1331: agha-damano mathurāyāṃ sadā sanātana-tanur jayati // RBhrs_2,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1334: asya pañca laharyaḥ syur vibhāvākhyāgrimā matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1336: vyabhicāry-abhidhā turyā sthāyi-saṃjñā ca pañcamī // RBhrs_2,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1341: eṣā kṛṣṇa-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvo bhakti-raso bhavet // RBhrs_2,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1343: eṣa bhakti-rasāsvādas tasyaiva hṛdi jāyate // RBhrs_2,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1349: ratir ānanda-rūpaiva nīyamānā tu rasyatām // RBhrs_2,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1352: kintu premā vibhāvādyaiḥ svalpair nīto 'py aṇīyasīm /
GR14ruphbr_u:1353: vibhāvanādy-avasthāṃ tu sadya āsvādyatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_2,1.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1356: kārya-bhūtāḥ smitādyāś ca tathāṣṭau stabdhatādayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1357: nirvedādyāḥ sahāyāś ca te jñeyā rasa-bhāvane /
GR14ruphbr_u:1358: vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1361: te dvidhālambanā eke tathaivoddīpanāḥ pare // RBhrs_2,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1363: vibhāvyate hi raty-ādir yatra yena vibhāvyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1366: kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktāś ca budhair ālambanā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1369: nāyakānāṃ śiro-ratnaṃ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1378: āvṛtaṃ prakaṭaṃ ceti svarūpaṃ kathitaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1390: karoty uccair modaṃ mama madhura-mūrtir madhuripuḥ // RBhrs_2,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1393: ruciras tejasā yukto balīyān vayasānvitaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1398: sthiro dāntaḥ kṣamā-śīlo gambhīro dhṛtimān samaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1399: vadānyo dhārmikaḥ śūraḥ karuṇo mānya-mānakṛt // RBhrs_2,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1405: samudrā iva pañcāśad durvigāhā harer amī // RBhrs_2,1.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1408: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai śiti-kaṇṭhena tad-guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1410: eta eva guṇāḥ prāyo dharmāya vana-mālinaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1413: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1414: śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam // RBhrs_2,1.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1415: jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1416: svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntir dhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca // RBhrs_2,1.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1417: prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1418: gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtir māno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1419: ime cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1420: prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit // RBhrs_2,1.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1421: atha pañca-guṇā ye syur aṃśena giriśādiṣu // RBhrs_2,1.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1433: ity asādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ govindasya catuṣṭayam // RBhrs_2,1.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1435: sodāharaṇam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate kramāt // RBhrs_2,1.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1437: ślāghyāṅga-sanniveśo yaḥ suramyāṅgaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1442: parikṣāmo madhyaḥ sphurati murahantur madhurimā // RBhrs_2,1.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1444: tanau guṇottham aṅkottham iti sal-lakṣaṇaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1446: guṇotthaṃ syād guṇair yogo raktatā-tuṅgatādibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1448: rāgaḥ saptasu hanta ṣaṭsv api śiśor aṅgeṣv alaṃ tuṅgatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1449: visāras triṣu kharvatā triṣu tathā gambhīratā ca triṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:1450: dairghyaṃ pañcasu kiṃ ca pañcasu sakhe samprekṣyate sūkṣmatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1451: dvātriṃśad-vara-lakṣaṇaḥ katham asau gopeṣu sambhāvyate // RBhrs_2,1.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1453: rekhāmayaṃ rathāṅgādi syād aṅkotthaṃ karādiṣu // RBhrs_2,1.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1472: tejo dhāma prabhāvaś cety ucyate dvividhaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1477: hari-vakṣasi ruci-niviḍe maṇirāḍ ayam uḍur iva sphurati // RBhrs_2,1.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1486: prāṇena mahatā pūrṇo balīyān iti kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1493: vāmas tāmarasākṣasya bhuja-daṇḍaḥ sa pātu vaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1494: krīḍā-kandukatāṃ yena nīto govardhano giriḥ // RBhrs_2,1.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1502: murārer mādhuryaṃ manasi madirākṣīr madayati // RBhrs_2,1.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1504: vividhādbhuta-bhāṣāvit sa prokto yas tu kovidaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1505: nānā-deśyāsu bhāṣāsu saṃskṛte prākṛteṣu ca // RBhrs_2,1.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1512: syān nānṛtaṃ vaco yasya satya-vākyaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1515: raṇorvaritam ity abhūt tava yathārtham evoditam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1516: ravir bhavati śītalaḥ kumuda-bandhur apy uṣṇalas
GR14ruphbr_u:1517: tathāpi na murāntaka vyabhicariṣṇur uktis tava // RBhrs_2,1.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1522: māṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ bhavataḥ sapatnam // RBhrs_2,1.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1532: iti dvidhā nigadito vāvadūko manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1542: hari-vāg iyaṃ mama dhinoti dhiyaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1544: vidvān nītijña ity eṣa supaṇḍityo dvidhā mataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1545: vidvān akhila-vidyā-vin nītijñas tu yathārha-kṛt // RBhrs_2,1.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1554: tvāṃ labdhāvasarā cirād gurukule prekṣya svasaṅgārthinaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1555: vidyā nāma vadhūś caturdaśa-guṇā govinda śuśrūyate // RBhrs_2,1.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1560: śāsti svasti-dhurandharo madhupurīṃ nītyā madhūnāṃ patiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1562: medhāvī sūkṣmadhīś ceti procyate buddhimān dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1565: guror jagati darśayan samayam atra vidyārthinām /
GR14ruphbr_u:1567: dadhau hṛdaya-mandire kim api citravan mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1569: yadubhir ayam avadhyo mleccha-rājas tad enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1572: jhara-muci mucukundaḥ kandare yatra śete // RBhrs_2,1.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1576: vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1578: yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
GR14ruphbr_u:1579: śaurir gopa-vadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃ-vidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1583: gītaṃ gumphati tāṇḍavaṃ ghaṭayati brūte prahelī-kramaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1584: veṇuṃ vādayate srajaṃ viracayaty ālekhyam abhyasyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:1585: nirmāti svayam indrajāla-paṭalīṃ dyūte jayaty unmadān
GR14ruphbr_u:1595: duṣkare kṣipra-kārī yas taṃ dakṣaṃ paricakṣate // RBhrs_2,1.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1598: haris tāny acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair ekaika-śastribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1603: dadṛśur adhikam etās taṃ yathā sva-sva-pārśve // RBhrs_2,1.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1605: kṛtajñaḥ syād abhijño yaḥ kṛta-sevādi-karmaṇām // RBhrs_2,1.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1606: yathā mahābhārate {*Not found in critical edition.}--

GR14ruphbr_u:2245: udañcad-romāñcaṃ racayati ca kṛṣṇaḥ parikaram // RBhrs_2,1.268 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2249: vadānyaḥ ko bhaved atra vadānyaḥ puruṣottamāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:2251: sāmānyā nāyaka-guṇāḥ sthiratādyā yad apy amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2252: tathāpi pūrvataḥ kiñcid viśeṣāt punar īritāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.271 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2255: uddhavādyās tathā mantre sahāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.272 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2258: yo satya-vākya ity ādyā hrīmān ity antimā guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2259: proktāḥ kṛṣṇe 'sya bhakteṣu te vijñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.274 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2260: te sādhakāś ca siddhāś ca dvi-vidhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.275 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2266: prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.277 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2269: tiṣṭhaty eva bhavāgni-hetir iti te dhīmann alaṃ cintayā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2272: bilvamaṅgala-tulyā ye sādhakās te prakīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.279 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2276: samprāpta-siddhayaḥ siddhā nitya-siddhāś ca te tridhā // RBhrs_2,1.281 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2278: sādhanaiḥ kṛpayā cāsya dvidhā samprāpta-siddhayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.282 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2282: dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2289: nirdhautāsya-taṭān muhuḥ pulakino dhanyān namaskurmahe // RBhrs_2,1.284 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2293: nāsāṃ dvijāti-saṃskāro na nivāso gurāv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:2294: na tapo nātma-mīmāṃsā na śaucaṃ na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.286 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2296: bhaktir dṛḍhā na cāsmākaṃ saṃskārādimatām api // RBhrs_2,1.287 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2299: na sādhana-vidhau ca te śrama-lavasya gandho 'py abhūt /
GR14ruphbr_u:2308: āgato 'haṃ gaṇāḥ sarve jātās te 'pi mayā saha // RBhrs_2,1.291 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2309: ete hi yādavāḥ sarve mad-gaṇā eva bhāmini /
GR14ruphbr_u:2313: yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam // RBhrs_2,1.293 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2316: nanda te tanaye 'smāsu tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham // RBhrs_2,1.294 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2317: sanātanaṃ mitram iti tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham /
GR14ruphbr_u:2318: sneho 'smāsv iti caiteṣāṃ nitya-preṣṭhatvam āgatam // RBhrs_2,1.295 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2320: eṣāṃ laukikavac-ceṣṭā līlā mura-ripor iva // RBhrs_2,1.296 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2323: tathā tenaiva jāyante nija-lokād yadṛcchayā // RBhrs_2,1.297 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2324: punas tenaiva gacchanti tat-padaṃ śāśvataṃ param /
GR14ruphbr_u:2325: na karma-bandhanaṃ janma vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vidyate // RBhrs_2,1.298 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2326: ye proktāḥ pañca-pañcāśat kramāt kaṃsaripor guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2327: te cānye cāpi siddheṣu siddhidatvādayo matāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.299 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2328: bhaktās tu kīrtitāḥ śāntās tathā dāsa-sutādayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2329: sakhāyo guru-vargāś ca preyasyaś ceti pañcadhā // RBhrs_2,1.300 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2331: uddīpanās tu te proktā bhāvam uddīpayanti ye /
GR14ruphbr_u:2332: te tu śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasya guṇāś ceṣṭāḥ prasādhanam // RBhrs_2,1.301 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2336: guṇās tu trividhāḥ proktāḥ kāya-vāṅ-mānasāśrayāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.303 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2339: guṇāḥ svarūpam evāsya kāyikādyā yadapy amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2340: bhedaṃ svīkṛtya varṇyante tathāpy uddīpanā iti // RBhrs_2,1.305 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2341: atas tasya svarūpasya syād ālambanataiva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2342: uddīpanatvam eva syād bhūṣaṇādes tu kevalam // RBhrs_2,1.306 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2343: eṣām ālambanatvaṃ ca tathoddīpanatāpi ca // RBhrs_2,1.307 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2345: vayaḥ kaumāra-paugaṇḍa-kaiśoram iti tat tridhā // RBhrs_2,1.308 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2347: ā-ṣoḍaśāc ca kaiśoraṃ yauvanaṃ syāt tataḥ param // RBhrs_2,1.309 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2348: aucityāt tatra kaumāraṃ vaktavyaṃ vatsale rase /
GR14ruphbr_u:2350: śraiṣṭhyam ujjvala evāsya kaiśorasya tathāpy adaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2352: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaiśoraṃ trividhaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_2,1.312 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2358: praviśati dṛśor ante kāntir manāg iva lohinī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2359: sakhi tanu- ruhāṃ rājiḥ sūkṣmā darāsya virohate
GR14ruphbr_u:2360: sphurati suṣamā navyedānīṃ tanau vana-mālinaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.314 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2369: radānāṃ rañjanaṃ rāga-cūrṇair ity ādi ceṣṭitam // RBhrs_2,1.317 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2372: śarālir iva śāṇitā nakhara-rājir agre kharā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2374: na kā sakhi samīkṣaṇād yuvatir asya vitrasyati // RBhrs_2,1.318 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2376: kartuṃ mugdhāḥ svayam acaṭunā na kṣamante 'bhiyogaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2377: na vyādātuṃ kvacid api jane vaktram apy utsahante /
GR14ruphbr_u:2379: sva-prāṇebhyas trayam udasṛjann adya toyāñjalīnām // RBhrs_2,1.319 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2381: ūru-dvayasya bāhvoś ca kāpi śrīr urasas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2382: mūrter mādhurimādyaṃ ca kaiśore sati madhyame // RBhrs_2,1.320 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2389: tri-jagan-mohanaṃ gītam ity ādir iha mādhurī // RBhrs_2,1.322 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2394: hares taruṇimāṅkure sphurati mādhurī kāpy abhūt // RBhrs_2,1.323 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2401: govindasya vilāsa-vṛndam adhikaṃ vṛndāṭavī śaṃsati // RBhrs_2,1.325 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2405: kathaṃ hā nas trāṇaṃ sakhi mukulayan bodha-kumudaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2409: tri-vali-vyaktir ity ādyaṃ kaiśore carame sati // RBhrs_2,1.327 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2420: idam eva hareḥ prājñair nava-yauvanam ucyate // RBhrs_2,1.330 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2424: kāntābhiḥ kalahāyate kvacid ayaṃ kandarpa-lekhān kvacit
GR14ruphbr_u:2427: sandhiṃ kvāpy anuśāsti kuñja-nṛpatiḥ śṛṅgāra-rājyottamam // RBhrs_2,1.332 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2432: kaiśoreṇa tavādya kṛṣṇa guruṇā gaurī-gaṇaḥ paṭhyate // RBhrs_2,1.333 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2434: netuḥ svarūpam evoktaṃ kaiśoram iha yadyapi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2437: tan nātirasa-vāhitvān na rasajñair udāhṛtam // RBhrs_2,1.335 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2439: bhavet saundaryam aṅgānāṃ sanniveśo yathocitam // RBhrs_2,1.336 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2444: na kasyāḥ kaṃsāre harati hṛdayaṃ paṅkaja-dṛśaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.337 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2446: vibhūṣaṇaṃ vibhūṣyaṃ syād yena tad rūpam ucyate // RBhrs_2,1.338 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2450: śaktā babhūva na manāg api tad-vidhāne
GR14ruphbr_u:2451: sā pratyuta svayam analpam alaṅkṛtāsīt // RBhrs_2,1.339 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2456: api nava-pallava-saṅgād aṅgāny aparajya śīryanti // RBhrs_2,1.341 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2458: guṇāḥ proktānta evātra jñeyā uddīpanā budhaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.342 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2460: ceṣṭā rāsādi-līlāḥ syus tathā duṣṭa-vadhādayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.343 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2465: rāsārambha-rasārthino madhurimā cetāṃsi naḥ karṣati // RBhrs_2,1.344 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2469: mlānaḥ salīlam api yatra śiro dhunāne /
GR14ruphbr_u:2471: taṃ duṣṭa-puṅgavam asau harir unmamātha // RBhrs_2,1.345 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2476: yugaṃ catuṣkaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vasanaṃ tri-vidhaṃ hareḥ // RBhrs_2,1.347 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2482: priyam iva kila varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2489: uṣṇīṣaṃ dadhad aruṇaṃ dhaṭīṃ ca citrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2490: kaṃsārir vahati mahotsave mudaṃ naḥ // RBhrs_2,1.351 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2493: aneka-varṇaṃ vasanaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.352 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2498: karoti karabhoru me ghana-rucir mudaṃ mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.353 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2502: syāj jūṭaḥ kavarī cūḍā veṇī ca kaca-bandhanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2503: pāṇḍuraḥ karburaḥ pīta ity ālepas tridhā mataḥ // RBhrs_2,1.355 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2507: tathā viśeṣako 'pi syād anyad ūhyaṃ svayaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.357 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2512: śyāmāṅga-dyutir adya me sakhi dṛśor dugdhe mudaṃ mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.358 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2517: kāñcī citrā mukuṭam atulaṃ kuṇḍale hāri-hīre
GR14ruphbr_u:2518: hāras tāro valayam amalaṃ candrā-cāruś catuṣkī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2519: ramyā cormir madhurima-pūre nūpure cety aghārer
GR14ruphbr_u:2520: aṅgair evābharaṇa-paṭalī bhūṣitā dogdhi bhūṣām // RBhrs_2,1.360 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2531: pulakayati vapur naḥ kāpy apūrvā munīnām /
GR14ruphbr_u:2539: eṣa tridhā bhaved veṇu-muralī-vaṃśikety api // RBhrs_2,1.365 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2542: sthaulye 'ṅguṣṭha-mitaḥ ṣaḍbhir eṣa randhraiḥ samanvitaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.366 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2548: tataḥ sārdhāṅgulād yatra mukha-randhraṃ tathāṅgulam // RBhrs_2,1.368 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2549: śiro vedāṅgulaṃ pucchaṃ try-aṅgulaṃ sā tu vaṃśikā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2552: mahānandeti vyākhyātā tathā saṃmohinīti ca // RBhrs_2,1.370 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2553: bhavet sūryāntarā sā cet tata ākarṣiṇī matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2554: ānandinī tadā vaṃśī bhaved indrāntarā yadi // RBhrs_2,1.371 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2555: gopānāṃ vallabhā seyaṃ vaṃśulīti ca viśrutā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2556: kramān maṇimayī haimī vaiṇavīti tridhā ca sā // RBhrs_2,1.372 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2569: bahir adya hanta guravaḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.375 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2582: prabhor amūny aṅghri-rajāṃsy aho iti // RBhrs_2,1.378 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2592: praviśan nāma mano dhinoti naḥ // RBhrs_2,1.380 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2594: yathā bilvamaṅgale {*Not in any of the KK centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:2609: kathaya sa dayitas te kvāyam āste vayasyaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.383 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2618: te bahir vikriyā prāyāḥ proktā udbhāsvarākhyayā // RBhrs_2,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2622: te śītāḥ kṣepaṇāś ceti yathārthākhyā dvidhoditāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2623: śītāḥ syur gīta-jṛmbhādyā nṛtyādyāḥ kṣepaṇābhidhāḥ // RBhrs_2,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2677: aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagad-gurau /
GR14ruphbr_u:2685: śaṅke prema-bhujaṅgena daṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ gato muniḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2686: niścalasya yad etasya lālā sravati vaktrataḥ // RBhrs_2,2.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2700: na putri racayauṣadhaṃ visṛja romam atyuddhataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2701: mudhā priya-sakhīṃ prati tvam aśivaṃ kim āśaṅkase /
GR14ruphbr_u:2703: varākṣi harir ity asau vitanute 'dya hikkā-bharam // RBhrs_2,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2711: bhāvaiś cittam ihākrāntaṃ sattvam ity ucyate budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2712: sattvād asmāt samutpannā ye ye bhāvās te tu sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2713: snigdhā digdhās tathā rukṣā ity amī trividhā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2715: snigdhās tu sāttvikā mukhyā gauṇāś ceti dvidhā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2717: ākramān mukhyayā ratyā mukhyāḥ syuḥ sāttvikā amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2718: vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhaḥ sākṣād evātra sūribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2724: mukhyaḥ stambho 'yam itthaṃ te jñeyāḥ svedādayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2727: atra kṛṣṇasya sambandhaḥ syāt kiñcid vyavadhānataḥ // RBhrs_2,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2736: jane jāta-ratau digdhās te ced raty-anugāminaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2742: kampo raty-anugāmitvād asau digdha itīryate // RBhrs_2,3.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2745: jātā bhaktopame rukṣā rati-śūnye jane kvacit // RBhrs_2,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2753: mumukṣu-prabhṛtau pūrvaṃ yo ratābhyāsa īritaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2754: cittaṃ sattvībhavat prāṇe nyasyaty ātmānam udbhaṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2755: prāṇas tu vikriyāṃ gacchan dehaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2756: tadā stambhādayo bhāvā bhakta-dehe bhavanty amī // RBhrs_2,3.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2758: vaivarṇyam aśru pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2760: kadācit sva-pradhānaḥ san dehe carati sarvataḥ // RBhrs_2,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2764: romāñca-kampa-vaivarṇyāṇy atra trīṇi tanoty asau // RBhrs_2,3.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2765: bahir antaś ca vikṣobha-vidhāyitvād ataḥ sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2783: tad-dhāmnābhūd ajas tūṣṇīṃ pūr-devy-antīva putrikā // RBhrs_2,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2785: śiśoḥ śyāmasya paśyantī śailam abhraṃlihaṃ kare /
GR14ruphbr_u:2823: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghri-
GR14ruphbr_u:2829: śrīdāmno yoddhu-kāmasya reme romāñcitaṃ vapuḥ // RBhrs_2,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2837: vaisvaryaṃ svara-bhedaḥ syād eṣa gadgadikādikṛt // RBhrs_2,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2858: tvayy arpitaṃ vitara veṇum iti pramādī
GR14ruphbr_u:2861: patrī mukunda tad anena sa hārito 'sti // RBhrs_2,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2871: cakampe drāg amarṣeṇa bhū-kampe girirāḍ iva // RBhrs_2,3.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2873: vihasasi kathaṃ hatāśe paśya bhayenādya kampamānāsmi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2874: cañcalam upasīdantaṃ nivāraya vraja-pates tanayam // RBhrs_2,3.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2880: gokulaṃ kṛṣṇa devarṣeḥ śvetadvīpa-bhramaṃ dadhe // RBhrs_2,3.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2891: viṣāde śvetimā proktā dhausaryaṃ kālimā kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:2892: roṣe tu raktimā bhītyāṃ kālimā kvāpi śuklimā // RBhrs_2,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2923: nābhyajānan imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva // RBhrs_2,3.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2924: sarve hi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2927: tata eva tāratamyaṃ sarveṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ syāt // RBhrs_2,3.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2929: vṛddhiṃ yathottaraṃ yāntaḥ sāttvikāḥ syuś catur-vidhāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2931: svarūpeṇa tathotkarṣa iti vṛddhis tridhā bhavet // RBhrs_2,3.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2939: prāyo dhūmāyitā eva rukṣās tiṣṭhanti sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2940: snigdhās tu prāyaśaḥ sarve caturdhaiva bhavanty amī // RBhrs_2,3.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2942: jvalanty ullāsinaḥ kvāpi te rukṣā api kasyacit // RBhrs_2,3.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2944: ete hi tad-vinābhāvān na camatkāritāśrayāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2947: īṣad-vyaktā apahnotuṃ śakyā dhūmāyitā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2954: te dvau trayo vā yugapad yāntaḥ suprakaṭāṃ daśām /
GR14ruphbr_u:2955: śakyāḥ kṛcchreṇa nihnotuṃ jvalitā iti kīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2957: na guñjām ādātuṃ prabhavati karaḥ kampa-taralo
GR14ruphbr_u:2958: dṛśau sāsre piñchaṃ na paricinutaṃ satvara-kṛti /
GR14ruphbr_u:2959: kṣamāv ūrū stabdhau padam api na gantuṃ tava sakhe
GR14ruphbr_u:2960: vanād vaṃśī-dhvāne parisaram avāpte śravaṇayoḥ // RBhrs_2,3.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2962: niruddhaṃ bāṣpāmbhaḥ katham api mayā gadgada-giro
GR14ruphbr_u:2963: hriyā sadyo gūḍhāḥ sakhi vighaṭito vepathur api /
GR14ruphbr_u:2965: tathāpy ūhāñcakre mama manasi rāgaḥ parijanaiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2967: prauḍhāṃ tri-caturā vyaktiṃ pañca vā yugapad-gatāḥ /

GR14ruphbr_u:2970: na śaktim upavīṇane ciram adhatta kampākulo
GR14ruphbr_u:2973: madhu-dviṣi parisphuraty avaśam-mūrtir āsīn muniḥ // RBhrs_2,3.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2975: kim unmīlaty asre kusumaja-rajo gañjasi mudhā
GR14ruphbr_u:2976: sa-romāñce kampe himam anilam ākrośasi kutaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2977: kim ūru-stambhe vā vana-viharaṇaṃ dvekṣi sakhi te
GR14ruphbr_u:2978: nirābādhā rādhe vadati madanādhiṃ svara-bhidā // RBhrs_2,3.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2980: ekadā vyaktim āpannāḥ pañca-ṣāḥ sarva eva vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2981: ārūḍhā paramotkarṣam uddīptā iti kīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2983: adya svidyati vepate pulakibhir nispandatām aṅgakair
GR14ruphbr_u:2984: dhatte kākubhir ākulaṃ vilapati mlāyaty analpoṣmabhiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2986: sadyas tad-viraheṇa muhyati muhur goṣṭhādhivāsī janaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2987: uddīptā eva sūddiptā mahā-bhāve bhavanty amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2988: sarva eva parāṃ koṭiṃ sāttvikā yatra bibhrati // RBhrs_2,3.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2992: niḥsattvāś ca pratīpāś ca yathā-pūrvam amī varāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2996: vārāṇasī-nivāsī kaścid ayaṃ vyāharan hareś caritam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2997: yati-goṣṭhyām utpulakaḥ siñcati gaṇḍa-dvayīm asraiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2999: mud-vismayāder ābhāsaḥ prodyan jātyā ślathe hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:3000: sattvābhāsa iti proktaḥ sattvābhāsa-bhavās tataḥ // RBhrs_2,3.86 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3008: niśamya vijayaṃ prabhor dadhati bāṣpa-dhārām amī // RBhrs_2,3.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3011: sattvābhāsaṃ vināpi syuḥ kvāpy aśru-pulakādayaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3013: niśamayato hari-caritaṃ na hi sukha-duḥkhādayo 'sya hṛdi bhāvāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3014: anabhiniveśāj jātā katham asravad asram aśrāntam // RBhrs_2,3.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3015: prakṛtyā śithilaṃ yeṣāṃ manaḥ picchilam eva vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3016: teṣv eva sāttvikābhāsaḥ prāyaḥ saṃsadi jāyate // RBhrs_2,3.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3018: hitād anyasya kṛṣṇasya pratīpāḥ krud-bhayādibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.92 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3023: vaktraṃ kaṃsasya roṣeṇa rakta-sūryāyate tadā // RBhrs_2,3.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3035: sāttvikānāṃ vivekāya dik tathāpi pradarśitā // RBhrs_2,3.96 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3044: ūrmivad vardhayanty enaṃ yānti tad-rūpatāṃ ca te // RBhrs_2,4.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3045: nirvedo 'tha viṣādo dainyaṃ glāni-śramau ca mada-garvau /
GR14ruphbr_u:3047: moho mṛtir ālasyaṃ jāḍyaṃ vrīḍāvahitthā ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:3048: smṛtir atha vitarka-cintā-mati-dhṛtayo harṣa utsukatvaṃ ca // RBhrs_2,4.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3049: augryam arṣāsūyāś cāpalyaṃ caiva nidrā ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:3050: suptir bodha itīme bhāvā vyabhicāriṇaḥ samākhyātāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3073: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3074: durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kim artham anuśabditaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3081: amaṅgalam api procya nirvedaṃ prathamaṃ muniḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3082: mene 'muṃ sthāyinaṃ śānta iti jalpanti kecana // RBhrs_2,4.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3089: jarāṃ yātā mūrtir mama vivaśatāṃ vāg api gatā
GR14ruphbr_u:3092: mayā hanta prāpto na bhajana-rucer apy avasaraḥ // RBhrs_2,4.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3097: hā tāvad eva tarasā virarāma nidrā // RBhrs_2,4.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3100: katham asau na nigṛhya gṛhe dhṛtaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3107: hy ahaṃ kiyān aiccham ivārcir agnau // RBhrs_2,4.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3109: syamantakam ahaṃ hṛtvā gato ghorāsyam antakam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3110: karavai taraṇīṃ kāṃ vā kṣipto vaitaraṇīyam anu // RBhrs_2,4.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3119: abhayam ṛtam aśokaṃ pāhi māpannam īśa // RBhrs_2,4.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3121: abhidravati mām īśa śaras taptāyaso vibho /
GR14ruphbr_u:3122: kāmaṃ dahatu māṃ nātha mā me garbho nipātyatām // RBhrs_2,4.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3131: mā'nayaṃ bhoḥ kṛthās tvāṃ tu nanda-gopa-sutaṃ priyam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3132: jānīmo 'ṅga vraja-ślāghyaṃ dehi vāsāṃsi vepitāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3134: ojaḥ somātmakaṃ dehe bala-puṣṭi-kṛd asya tu /
GR14ruphbr_u:3172: prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamenāṅga pāṇinā // RBhrs_2,4.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3174: viveka-hara ullāso madaḥ sa dvi-vidho mataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3179: bile kva nu vililyire nṛpa-pipīlikāḥ pīḍitāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:3180: pinasmi jagad-aṇḍakaṃ nanu hariḥ krudhaṃ dhāsyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:3181: śacī-gṛha-kuraṅga re hasasi kiṃ tvam ity unnadann
GR14ruphbr_u:3185: kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3187: mada-skhalitam ālapan hala-dharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt // RBhrs_2,4.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3188: uttamas tu madāc chete madhyo hasati pāyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:3189: kaniṣṭhaḥ krośati svairaṃ puruṣaṃ vakti roditi // RBhrs_2,4.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3191: atra nātyupayogitvād vistārya na hi varṇitaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3195: pralapati muhur ālīṃ vandate paśya vṛnde
GR14ruphbr_u:3204: hastam utkṣipya yāto 'si balāt kṛṣṇa kim adbhutam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3205: hṛdayād yadi niryāsi pauruṣaṃ gaṇayāmi te // RBhrs_2,4.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3210: dṛk-pātam ācaratu kṛṣṇa kathaṃ sakhī me // RBhrs_2,4.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3215: kṛṣṇo madīyāṃ hṛdi vismitaḥ srajam // RBhrs_2,4.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3218: tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid
GR14ruphbr_u:3229: svāniṣṭotprekṣaṇaṃ yat tu sā śaṅkety abhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:3245: śriyam aviśaṅkam alaṅkuru tvam aindrīm // RBhrs_2,4.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3252: śaṅkā tu pravara-strīṇāṃ bhīrutvād bhaya-kṛd bhavet // RBhrs_2,4.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3258: rakṣa kṛṣṇeti cukrośa ko 'pi gopī-stanandhayaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3270: pūrvāpara-vicārotthaṃ bhayaṃ trāsāt pṛthag bhavet // RBhrs_2,4.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3272: cittasya sambhramo yaḥ syād āvego 'yaṃ sa cāṣṭadhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3284: saṅkulā pulakair āsīd ākulā gokuleśvarī // RBhrs_2,4.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3290: kim idaṃ kim idaṃ kim etad uccair
GR14ruphbr_u:3300: dhīr vyagrājani naḥ samasta-suhṛdāṃ tāṃ prāṇa-rakṣā-maṇiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3301: gavyā gauravataḥ samīkṣya niviḍe tiṣṭhantam antar-vane /
GR14ruphbr_u:3302: vahniḥ paśya śikhaṇḍa-śekhara kharaṃ muñcann akhaṇḍa-dhvaniṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3308: kṣauṇyām aprekṣya putraṃ vrajapati-gṛhiṇī paśya sambambhramīti // RBhrs_2,4.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3311: gopā gopyaś ca śītārtā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // RBhrs_2,4.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3315: ajaniṣata yuvāno 'py ākulās tvaṃ tu bālaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:3316: sphuṭam asi tad-agārān mā sma bhūr niryiyāsuḥ // RBhrs_2,4.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3319: upari ghuranti ca hanta ghoram ulkāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3321: taṭam aṭatīty adhunā kim atra kuryām // RBhrs_2,4.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3332: dragiṣṭhe muhur atra jāgrati bhuje vyagrāsi mātaḥ katham // RBhrs_2,4.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3334: sthūlas tāla-bhujān natir giritaṭī-vakṣāḥ kva yakṣādhamaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:3336: nāsty anyaḥ saha-kāritā-paṭur iha prāṇī na jānīmahe
GR14ruphbr_u:3337: hā goṣṭheśvari kīdṛg adya tapasāṃ pākas tavonmīlati // RBhrs_2,4.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3339: saptiḥ saptī ratha iha rathaḥ kuñjaro me
GR14ruphbr_u:3340: tūṇas tūṇo dhanur uta dhanur bhoḥ kṛpāṇī kṛpāṇī /
GR14ruphbr_u:3341: kā bhīḥ kā bhīr ayam ayam ahaṃ hā tvaradhvaṃ tvaradhvaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3342: rājñaḥ putrī bata hṛta-hṛtā kāminā vallavena // RBhrs_2,4.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3356: paśūn api kṛtāñjalir namati māntrikā ity alaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3357: tarūn api cikitsakā iti viṣauṣadhaṃ pṛcchati /
GR14ruphbr_u:3358: hradaṃ bhujaga-bhairavaṃ hari hari praviṣṭe harau
GR14ruphbr_u:3359: vrajendra-gṛhiṇī muhur bhrama-mayīm avasthāṃ gatā // RBhrs_2,4.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3365: unmādaḥ pṛthag ukto 'yaṃ vyādhiṣv antarbhavann api /
GR14ruphbr_u:3366: yat tatra vipralambhādau vaicitrīṃ kurute parām // RBhrs_2,4.84 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3382: ghūrṇann arṇava-sīmni maṇḍalatayā bhrāmyan na viśrāmyati // RBhrs_2,4.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3384: parāṃ bhayānakābhāse yat karoti camatkṛtim // RBhrs_2,4.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3387: iha tat-prabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:3395: moho hṛn-mūḍhatā harṣād viśleṣād bhayatas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3396: viṣādādeś ca tatra syād dehasya patanaṃ bhuvi /
GR14ruphbr_u:3400: itthaṃ sma pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu bādarāyaṇis
GR14ruphbr_u:3413: avasthā tastāra sphuṭam atha suṣupteḥ priya-sakhī // RBhrs_2,4.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3421: babhūvur indriyāṇīva vinā prāṇaṃ vicetasaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3423: kṛṣṇa-sphūrti-viśeṣas tu na kadāpy atra līyate // RBhrs_2,4.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3430: vivṛṇvantaḥ kāye kim api nava-vaivarṇyam abhitaḥ /

GR14ruphbr_u:3437: kṣayam agamad akasmāt pūtanā kāla-rātriḥ // RBhrs_2,4.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3438: prāyo 'tra maraṇāt pūrvā citta-vṛttir mṛtir matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3439: mṛtir atrānubhāvaḥ syād iti kenacid ucyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:3440: kintu nāyaka-vīryārthaṃ śatrau maraṇam ucyate // RBhrs_2,4.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3447: viprāṇāṃ nas tathā tṛptir āsīd govardhanotsave /

GR14ruphbr_u:3472: pūjāyāṃ nāvidat kṛtyaṃ pramādopahato nṛpaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.110 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3475: yāvad ālakṣyate ketur yāvad reṇū rathasya ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:3478: mukunda viraheṇa te vidhuritāḥ sakhāyaś cirād
GR14ruphbr_u:3479: alaṅkṛtibhir ujjhitā bhuvi niviśya tatra sthitāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3484: adhṛṣṭatā bhaved vrīḍā tatra maunaṃ vicintanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3491: vikrīte kariṇi kim aṅkuśe vivādaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.114 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3493: tvam avāg iha mā śiraḥ kṛthā
GR14ruphbr_u:3499: uddhavasya vyarociṣṭa namrī-bhūtaṃ tadā śiraḥ // RBhrs_2,4.116 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3504: priyā bhūtvā'priyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmi taṃ punaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3521: sauśīlyataḥ kila na ko 'pi vidāmbabhūva // RBhrs_2,4.122 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3529: dūti yatra smṛte mūrtir bhītyā romāñcitā mama // RBhrs_2,4.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3532: prauḍhāpy asyā ratiḥ kṛṣṇe durvitarkā parair abhūt // RBhrs_2,4.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3537: yatnena smitam atha saṃvavāra patrī // RBhrs_2,4.126 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3538: hetuḥ kaścid bhavet kaścid gopyaḥ kaścana gopanaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3540: hetutvaṃ gopanatvaṃ ca gopyatvaṃ cātra sambhavet /
GR14ruphbr_u:3545: bhaved atra śiraḥ-kampo bhrū-vikṣepādayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.129 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3548: smāraṃ smāraṃ mukunda tvāṃ smāraṃ vikramam anvabhūt // RBhrs_2,4.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3550: praṇidhāna-vidhim idānīm akurvato 'pi pramādato hṛdi me /
GR14ruphbr_u:3553: vimarṣāt saṃśayādeś ca vitarkas tūha ucyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:3557: na jānīṣe mūrdhnaś cyutam api śikhaṇḍaṃ yad akhilaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3558: na kaṇṭhe yan mālyaṃ kalayasi purastāt kṛtam api /
GR14ruphbr_u:3562: asau kiṃ tāpiñcho na hi tad-amala-śrīr iha gatiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:3563: payodaḥ kiṃ vāmaṃ na yad iha niraṅko himakaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3565: dhruvaṃ mūrdhany adrer vidhu-mukhi mukundo viharati // RBhrs_2,4.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3566: vinirṇayānta evāyaṃ tarka ity ūcire pare // RBhrs_2,4.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3576: tasthur mṛjantya uru-duḥkha-bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm // RBhrs_2,4.137 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3579: katham api cirād adhyāsīnā praghāṇam aghāntaka /
GR14ruphbr_u:3580: vidhūrita-mukhī ghūrṇaty antaḥ prasūs tava cintayā
GR14ruphbr_u:3581: kim ahaha gṛhaṃ krīḍā-lubdha tvayādya visasmare // RBhrs_2,4.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3586: tava sutam aham eva drāk parāvartayāmi // RBhrs_2,4.139 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3590: upadeśaś ca śiṣyāṇām ūhāpohādayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.141 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3592: vyāmohāya carācarasya jagatas te te purāṇāgamās
GR14ruphbr_u:3593: tāṃ tām eva hi devatāṃ paramikāṃ jalpantu kalpāvadhi /
GR14ruphbr_u:3594: siddhānte punar eka eva bhagavān viṣṇuḥ samastāgama-
GR14ruphbr_u:3598: ātmātmadaś ca jagatām iti me vṛto 'si /
GR14ruphbr_u:3608: śayīmahi mahī-pṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kim īśvaraiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.145 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3616: mano mama catur-vargaṃ tṛṇāyāpi na manyate // RBhrs_2,4.147 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3619: harṣaḥ syād iha romāñcaḥ svedo 'śru mukha-phullatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3628: candanāliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭaromā cucumba ha // RBhrs_2,4.150 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3636: sadyo visṛjya gṛha-karma patīṃś ca talpe
GR14ruphbr_u:3637: draṣṭuṃ yayur yuvatayaḥ sma narendra-mārge // RBhrs_2,4.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3640: druta-gati harim ārāt prāpya kuñje smitākṣī /
GR14ruphbr_u:3642: snapayati nija-dāsye rādhikā māṃ kadā nu // RBhrs_2,4.153 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3654: huta-bhuji bata kuryāṃ jāṭhare vauṣaḍ enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3655: sapadi danuja-hantuḥ kintu roṣād bibhemi // RBhrs_2,4.156 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3658: na hi danuja-ripor yaḥ prauṅdha-kīrter visoḍhum /
GR14ruphbr_u:3660: śirasi pṛthuni tasya nyasyate savya-pādaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.157 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3664: hahā bata viḍambanā śiva śivādya naḥ śṛṇvatāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3665: haṭhād iha kaṭākṣayanty akhila-vandyam apy acyutam // RBhrs_2,4.158 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3673: kalyāṇī me nivasati vadhūḥ paśya pārśve navoḍhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3675: niḥśaṅkas tvaṃ bhramasi bhavitā nākulatvaṃ kuto me // RBhrs_2,4.161 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3678: jane bhavati mad-vidhe paribhavo hi nātaḥ paraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3680: varāpi yad ayogyayā sphuṭam adūṣi tārākhyayā // RBhrs_2,4.162 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3686: kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi // RBhrs_2,4.163 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3693: {*Attributed to Dāmodara in Padyāvalī. Also found in Amaru 55;
GR14ruphbr_u:3696: SāhD 3.105 (as an example of mada); Daśa 2.22.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:3699: anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3700: vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3702: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat /
GR14ruphbr_u:3705: svayaṃ parājayaṃ prāptān kṛṣṇa-pakṣān vijitya naḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3706: baliṣṭhā bala-pakṣāś ced durbalāḥ ke tataḥ kṣitau // RBhrs_2,4.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3718: guror api puro nīvīṃ yā bhraṃśayati subhruvām // RBhrs_2,4.170 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3732: sukham avicalad-aṅgāḥ śerate paśya gopāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.174 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3735: vakṣasi nikṣiptāṅgī harer viśākhā yayau nidrām // RBhrs_2,4.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3737: hṛn-mīlanāt puro 'vasthā nidrā bhakteṣu kathyate // RBhrs_2,4.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3743: darpaḥ sarpa-pates tad asya tarasā nirdhūyatām uddhūraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3744: ity utsvapna-girā cirād yadu-sabhāṃ vismāpayan smerayan
GR14ruphbr_u:3745: niḥśvāsena darottaraṅgad-udaraṃ nidrāṃ gato lāṅgalī // RBhrs_2,4.178 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3773: drutaṃ mūrcchām antaḥ sakhi sukha-mayīṃ pallavayati // RBhrs_2,4.185 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3783: iyaṃ te hāsa-śrīr viramatu vimuñcāñcalam idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3785: iti svapne jalpanty aciram avabuddhā gurum asau
GR14ruphbr_u:3786: puro dṛṣṭvā gaurī namita-mukha-bimbā muhur abhūt // RBhrs_2,4.188 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3788: dūtī cāgāt tad-āgāraṃ jajāgāra ca rādhikā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3789: tūrṇaṃ puṇyavatīnāṃ hi tanoti phalam udyamaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.189 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3796: klaibyaṃ kṣamā ca kutukam utkaṇṭhā vinayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.192 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3797: saṃśayo dhārṣṭyam ity ādyā bhāvā ye syuḥ pare 'pi ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:3798: ukteṣv antarbhavantīti na pṛthaktvena darśitāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.193 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3800: asūyāyāṃ tu mātsaryaṃ trāse 'py udvega eva tu /
GR14ruphbr_u:3802: viveko nirṇayaś cemau dainye klaibyaṃ kṣamā dhṛtau // RBhrs_2,4.194 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3804: saṃśayo 'ntarbhavet tarke tathā dhārṣṭyaṃ ca cāpale // RBhrs_2,4.195 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3806: vibhāvaś cānubhāvaś ca bhaved eva parasparam // RBhrs_2,4.196 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3807: nirvede tu yatherṣyāyā bhaved atra vibhāvatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3808: asūyāyāṃ punas tasyā vyaktam uktānubhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.197 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3810: nidrāṃ prati vibhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyaḥ pare 'py amī // RBhrs_2,4.198 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3811: eṣāṃ ca sāttvikānāṃ ca tathā nānā-kriyā-tateḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3812: kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvas tu jñeyaḥ prāyeṇa lokataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.199 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3816: augryaṃ pratyanubhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyāḥ pare 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.201 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3818: sañcāriṇām iha kvāpi bhaved raty-anubhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.202 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3819: sākṣād-rater na sambandhaḥ ṣaḍbhis trāsādibhiḥ saha /
GR14ruphbr_u:3823: paratantrāḥ svatantrāś cety uktāḥ sañcāriṇo dvidhā // RBhrs_2,4.205 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3825: varāvaratayā proktāḥ paratantrā api dvidhā // RBhrs_2,4.206 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3827: sākṣād vyavahitaś ceti varo 'py eṣa dvidhoditaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.207 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3829: mukhyām eva ratiṃ puṣṇan sākṣād ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_2,4.208 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3834: vyarthena kiṃ hanta dṛśor dvayena // RBhrs_2,4.209 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3836: puṣṇāti yo ratiṃ gauṇīṃ sa vyavahito mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.210 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3838: dhig astu me bhuja-dvandvaṃ bhīmasya parighopamam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3839: mādhavākṣepiṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ yat pinaṣṭi na cedipam // RBhrs_2,4.211 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3840: nirvedaḥ krodha-vaśyatvād ayaṃ vyavahito rateḥ // RBhrs_2,4.212 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3842: rasa-dvayasyāpy aṅgatvam agacchann avaro mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.213 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3847: na svaṃ viśuṣyan smarati sma jiṣṇuḥ // RBhrs_2,4.214 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3849: durvarāvirabhūd bhītir moho 'yaṃ bhī-vaśas tataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.215 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3854: rati-gandhiś ca te tredhā svatantrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.217 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3856: janeṣu rati-śūnyeṣu rati-śūnyo bhaved asau // RBhrs_2,4.218 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3858: dhig janma nas trivṛd-vidyāṃ dhig vrataṃ dhig bahujñatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:3859: dhik kulaṃ dhik kriyā-dīkṣāṃ vimukhā ye tv adhokṣaje // RBhrs_2,4.219 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3863: paścād ratiṃ spṛśed eṣa raty-anusparśano mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.220 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3866: hā kṛṣṇa pāhi pāhīti cukrośābhīra-bālikā // RBhrs_2,4.221 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3869: yaḥ svātantrye 'pi tad-gandhaṃ rati-gandhir vyanakti saḥ // RBhrs_2,4.222 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3872: saṅgopanāya na hi naptri vidhehi yatnam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3876: ābhāsaḥ punar eteṣām asthāne vṛttito bhavet /
GR14ruphbr_u:3879: vipakṣe vṛttir eteṣāṃ prātikūlyam itīryate // RBhrs_2,4.225 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3894: aprāṇini bhaved ādyaḥ tiryag-ādiṣu cāntimam // RBhrs_2,4.228 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3896: chāyā na yasya sakṛd apy upasevitābhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:3897: kṛṣṇena hanta mama tasya dhig astu janma /
GR14ruphbr_u:3898: mā tvaṃ kadamba vidhuro bhava kāliyāhiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3899: mṛdnan kariṣyati hariś caritārthatāṃ te // RBhrs_2,4.229 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3902: adhirohatu kaḥ pakṣī kakṣām aparo mamādya medhyasya /
GR14ruphbr_u:3903: hitvāpi tārkṣya-paksaṃ bhajate pakṣaṃ harir yasya // RBhrs_2,4.230 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3908: daśāś catasra etāsām utpattis tv iha sambhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.232 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3917: uṣasi sakhi tavālī mekhalā paśya bhāti /
GR14ruphbr_u:3919: dṛśam anṛju kirantī rādhikā vaḥ punātu // RBhrs_2,4.234 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3922: sarūpayor bhinnayor vā sandhiḥ syād bhāvayor yutiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.235 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3924: sandhiḥ sarūpayos tatra bhinna-hetūtthayor mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.236 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3934: durvāracāpalo 'yaṃ dhāvann antar bahiś ca goṣṭhasya /
GR14ruphbr_u:3935: śiśur akutaścid bhītir dhinoti hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me // RBhrs_2,4.239 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3941: himam uṣṇaṃ ca jalaṃ dṛśor dadhe // RBhrs_2,4.240 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3944: bahūnām api bhāvānāṃ sandhiḥ sphuṭam avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,4.241 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3949: dṛśaṃ nyasyanty asmin jayati vṛṣabhānoḥ kula-maṇiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.242 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3954: harim api dara-dūre svāminaṃ tatra cāsīn
GR14ruphbr_u:3958: śavalatvaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ saṃmardaḥ syāt parasparam // RBhrs_2,4.244 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3960: śaktaḥ kiṃ nāma kartuṃ sa śiśur ahaha me mitra-pakṣānadhākṣīd
GR14ruphbr_u:3961: ātiṣṭheyaṃ tam eva drutam atha śaraṇaṃ kuryur etan na vīrāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3962: āṃ divyā malla-goṣṭhī viharati sa kareṇoddadhārādri-varyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3963: kuryām adyaiva gatvā vraja-bhuvi kadanaṃ hā tataḥ kampate dhīḥ // RBhrs_2,4.245 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3966: dhig dīrghe nayane mamāstu mathurā yābhyāṃ na sā prekṣyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3967: vidyeyaṃ mama kiṅkarī-kṛta-nṛpā kālas tu sarvaṅkaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3968: lakṣmī-keli-gṛhaṃ gṛhaṃ mama hahā nityaṃ tanuḥ kṣīyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3969: sadmany eva hariṃ bhajeya hṛdayaṃ vṛndāṭavī karṣati // RBhrs_2,4.246 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3972: atyārūḍhasya bhāvasya vilayaḥ śāntir ucyate // RBhrs_2,4.247 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3981: trayastriṃśad ime 'ṣṭau ca vakṣyante sthāyinaś ca ye /
GR14ruphbr_u:3982: mukhya-bhāvābhidhās tv eka-catvāriṃśad amī smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.250 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3985: kvacit svābhāviko bhāvaḥ kaścid āgantukaḥ kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:3986: yas tu svābhāviko bhāvaḥ sa vyāpyāntar-bahiḥ-sthitaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.252 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3987: mañjiṣṭhādye yathā dravye rāgas tan-maya īkṣyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:3988: atra syān nāma-mātreṇa vibhāvasya vibhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.253 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3990: eka-rūpāpi yā bhakter vividhā pratibhāty asau // RBhrs_2,4.254 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3991: āgantukas tu yo bhāvaḥ paṭādau raktimeva saḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3992: tais tair vibhāvair evāyaṃ dhīyate dīpyate 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.255 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3995: vividhānāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyād vividhaṃ manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3998: samyag-unmīlitāś cāmī na lakṣyante sphuṭaṃ janaiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.258 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4000: manāg-unmīlitāś cāmī lakṣyante bahir ulbaṇāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.259 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4005: pattanābhaṃ mahiṣṭhaṃ syāt kṣodiṣṭhaṃ tu kuṭiravat /
GR14ruphbr_u:4007: karkaśaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ vajraṃ svarṇaṃ tathā jatu /
GR14ruphbr_u:4010: īdṛśaṃ tāpasādīnāṃ cittaṃ tāvad avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,4.264 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4012: jatu dravatvam āyāti tāpa-leśena sarvataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.265 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4014: amṛtaṃ ceti bhāvo 'tra prāyaḥ sūryātapāyate // RBhrs_2,4.266 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4017: govinda-preṣṭha-varyāṇāṃ cittaṃ syād amṛtaṃ kila // RBhrs_2,4.267 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4019: samavetaṃ sadāmībhir dvitrair api mano bhavet // RBhrs_2,4.268 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4020: kintu suṣṭhu mahiṣṭhatvaṃ bhāvo bāḍham upāgataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4021: sarva-prakāram evedaṃ cittaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam // RBhrs_2,4.269 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4024: ahāryāṃ maryādāṃ dadhad api harer āspadam api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4025: satāṃ stomaḥ premaṇy udayati samagre sthagayituṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4026: vikāraṃ na sphāraṃ jala-nidhir ivendau prabhavati // RBhrs_2,4.270 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4030: aviruddhān viruddhāṃś ca bhāvān yo vaśatāṃ nayan /
GR14ruphbr_u:4031: su-rājeva virājeta sa sthāyī bhāva ucyate // RBhrs_2,5.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4032: sthāyī bhāvo 'tra sa proktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-viṣayā ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4033: mukhyā gauṇī ca sā dvedhā rasa-jñaiḥ parikīrtitā // RBhrs_2,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4036: mukhyāpi dvi-vidhā svārthā parārthā ceti kīrtyate // RBhrs_2,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4038: aviruddhaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāvaiḥ puṣṇāty ātmānam eva yā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4039: viruddhair duḥkha-glāniḥ sā svārthā kathitā ratiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4041: aviruddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca saṅkucantī svayaṃ ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4042: yā bhāvam anugṛhṇāti sā parārthā nigadyate // RBhrs_2,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4043: śuddhā prītis tathā sakhyaṃ vātsalyaṃ priyatety asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4044: svaparārthyaiva sā mukhyā punaḥ pañca-vidhā bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4048: sāmānyāsau tathā svacchā śāntiś cety ādimā tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4052: bālikadaiś ca kṛṣṇe syāt sāmānyā sā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4054: asmin mathurā-vīthyām udayati madhure virocane purataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4055: kathasva sakhe mradimānaṃ mānasa-madanaṃ kim eti mama // RBhrs_2,5.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4058: yā puraḥ kṛṣṇam ālokya huṅkurvaty abhidhāvati // RBhrs_2,5.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4061: sādhākānāṃ tu vaividhyaṃ yāntī svacchā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4062: yadā yādṛśī bhakte syād āsaktis tādṛśaṃ tadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4063: rūpaṃ sphaṭikavad dhatte svacchāsau tena kīrtitā // RBhrs_2,5.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4065: kvacit prabhur iti stuvan kvacana mitram ity uddhasan
GR14ruphbr_u:4066: kvacit tanaya ity avan kvacana kānta ity ullasan /
GR14ruphbr_u:4067: kvacin manasi bhāvayan parama eṣa ātmety asāv
GR14ruphbr_u:4068: abhūd vividha-sevayā vividha-vṛttir āryo dvijaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4070: āryāṇām atiśuddhānāṃ prāyaḥ svacchā ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4072: mānase nirvikalpatvaṃ śama ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_2,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4075: ātmanaḥ kathyate so 'tra svabhāvaḥ śama ity asau // RBhrs_2,5.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4077: paramātmatayā kṛṣṇe jātā śānta-ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4080: sanakasya tanau kampo brahmānubhavino 'py abhūt // RBhrs_2,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4085: paramaṃ brahma didṛkṣate mano me // RBhrs_2,5.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4087: rater asyā asamparkād iyaṃ śuddheti bhaṇyate // RBhrs_2,5.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4088: atha bheda-trayī hṛdyā rateḥ prīty-ādir īryate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4091: tri-vidheṣu trayī prītiḥ sakhyaṃ vatsalatety asau // RBhrs_2,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4093: kevalā saṅkulā ceti dvi-vidheyaṃ rati-trayī // RBhrs_2,5.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4097: gurau ca vrajanāthādau krameṇaiva sphuraty asau // RBhrs_2,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4099: eṣāṃ dvayos trayāṇāṃ vā sannipātas tu saṅkulā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4100: udbhavādau ca bhīmādau mathurādau krameṇa sā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4101: yasyādhikyaṃ bhaved yatra sa tena vyapadiśyate // RBhrs_2,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4103: svasmād bhavanti ye nyūnās te 'nugrāhyā harer matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4104: ārādhyatvātmikā teṣāṃ ratiḥ prītir itīritā // RBhrs_2,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4105: tatrāsakti-kṛd anyatra prīti-saṃhāriṇī hy asau // RBhrs_2,5.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4107: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso
GR14ruphbr_u:4112: ye syus tulyā mukundasya te sakhāyaḥ satāṃ matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4123: sadyas tvayā tad api kathanam eva kṛtvā
GR14ruphbr_u:4124: devyai hriye trayam adāyi jvalāñjalīnām // RBhrs_2,5.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4126: guravo ye harer asya te pūjyā iti viśrutāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4132: gās tatra rakṣitum asau gahane mṛdur me
GR14ruphbr_u:4133: bālaḥ prayāty avirataṃ bata kiṃ karomi // RBhrs_2,5.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4146: ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit // RBhrs_2,5.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4149: saṅkucantyā svayaṃ ratyā sa gauṇī ratir ucyate // RBhrs_2,5.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4150: hāso vismaya utsāhaḥ śokaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4151: jugupsā cety asau bhāva-viśeṣaḥ saptadhoditaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4153: syād dehādi-vibhāvatvaṃ saptamyās tu rater vaśāt // RBhrs_2,5.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4155: parārthāyā rater yogād rati-śabdaḥ prayujyate // RBhrs_2,5.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4156: hāsottarā ratir yā syāt sā hāsa-ratir ucyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4157: evaṃ vismaya-raty-ādyā vijñeyā ratayaś ca ṣaṭ // RBhrs_2,5.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4158: kañcit kālaṃ kvacid bhakte hāsādyāḥ sthāyitām amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:4161: sahajā api līyante baliṣṭhena tiraskṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4164: syur etasyā vinā-bhāvād bhāvāḥ sarve nirarthakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4168: nirvedādyā vilīyante nārhanti sthāyitāṃ tataḥ // RBhrs_2,5.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4169: ity ato mati-garvādi-bhāvānāṃ ghaṭate na hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4170: sthāyitā kaiścid iṣṭāpi pramāṇaṃ tatra tad-vidaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4171: sapta hāsādayas tv ete tais tair nītāḥ supuṣṭatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4172: bhakteṣu sthāyitāṃ yānto rucir ebhyo vitanvate // RBhrs_2,5.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4182: mayā dṛg api nārpitā sumukhi dadhni tubhyaṃ śape
