GR14ruphbr_u:4183: sakhī tava nirargalā tad api me mukhaṃ jighrati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4184: praśādhi tad imāṃ mudhā cchalita-sādhum ity acyute
GR14ruphbr_u:4185: vadaty ajani dūtikā hasita-rodhane na kṣamā // RBhrs_2,5.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4189: pūrvokta-rītyā niṣpannaḥ sa vismaya-ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4194: para-brahmollāsān vahati kim idaṃ hanta kim idam // RBhrs_2,5.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4197: satvarā mānasāsaktir utsāha iti kīrtyate // RBhrs_2,5.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4199: siddhaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā sa utsāha ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4237: niṣpannaṃ pūrvavad idaṃ budhā bhaya-ratiṃ viduḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4238: eṣāpi krodha-rativad dvi-vidhā kathitā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4252: rater anugrahāj jātā sā jugupsā-ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4259: ity aṣṭau sthāyino yāvad rasāvasthāṃ na saṃśritāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4261: ihāṣṭau sāttvikāś caite bhāvākhyās tān asaṅkhyakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4267: prāyaḥ sukha-mayāḥ śītā uṣṇā duḥkha-mayā iha /
GR14ruphbr_u:4268: citreyaṃ paramānanda-sāndrāpy uṣṇā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4269: śītair bhāvair baliṣṭhais tu puṣṭā śītāyate hy asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4270: uṣṇais tu ratir atyuṣṇā tāpayantīva bhāsate // RBhrs_2,5.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4271: ratir dvidhāpi kṛṣṇādyaiḥ śrutair avagataiḥ smṛtaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4272: tair vibhāvāditāṃ yadbhis tad-bhakteṣu raso bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4281: gacchanto rasa-rūpatvaṃ militā yānty akhaṇḍatām // RBhrs_2,5.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4283: udbhāsaḥ kasyacit kvāpi vibhāvādes tathā rase // RBhrs_2,5.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4285: stambhādyāḥ kāra-bhūtāś ca nirvedādyāḥ sahāyakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4289: vibhāvayanti kurvantīty uktā dhīrair vibhāvakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4291: ity uktā anubhāvās te kaṭākṣādyāḥ sa-sāttvikāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4293: ye nirvedādayo bhāvās te tu sañcāriṇo matāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4295: sevām āhuḥ paraṃ hetuṃ kecit tat-pakṣa-rāgiṇaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4297: rater asyāḥ prabhāvo 'yaṃ bhavet kāraṇam uttamam // RBhrs_2,5.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4299: raty-ākhyā ity ayaṃ yukto na hi tarkeṇa bādhitum /
GR14ruphbr_u:4300: bhāratādy-uktir eṣā hi prāktanair apy udāhṛtā // RBhrs_2,5.92 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4302: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa yojayet
GR14ruphbr_u:4303: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam // RBhrs_2,5.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4305: etair eva tathābhūtaiḥ svaṃ saṃvardhayati sphuṭam // RBhrs_2,5.94 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4306: yathā svair eva salilaiḥ paripūrya balāhakān /
GR14ruphbr_u:4307: ratnālayo bhavaty ebhir vṛṣṭais tair eva vāridhiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4311: rater eva prabhāvo 'yaṃ hetus teṣāṃ tathākṛtau // RBhrs_2,5.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4313: tathānubhūyamānās te vistīrṇāṃ kurvate ratim // RBhrs_2,5.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4315: atra sāhāyikaṃ vyaktaṃ mitho 'jasram avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,5.99 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4316: kintv etasyāḥ prabhāvo 'pi vairūpye sati kuñcati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4317: vairūpyas tu vibhāvāder anaucityam udīryate // RBhrs_2,5.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4319: yatra sādhāraṇatayā bhāvāḥ sādhu sphuranty amī // RBhrs_2,5.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4321: sādhāraṇyaṃ tad evoktaṃ bhāvānāṃ pūrva-sūribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4324: pramātā tad-abhedena svaṃ yayā pratipadyate // RBhrs_2,5.103 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:4325: duḥkhādayaḥ sphuranto 'pi jātu bhāntaḥ svīyatayā hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4333: rasaḥ syān neti nāṭya-jñā yad āhur yuktam eva tat // RBhrs_2,5.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4335: yoge rasa-viśeṣatvaṃ gacchanty eva hari-priye // RBhrs_2,5.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4344: rasasya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati // RBhrs_2,5.112 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4345: pūrvam uktād dvidhā bhdedān mukhya-gauṇatayā rateḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4346: bhaved bhakti-raso 'py eṣa mukhya-gauṇatayā dvidhā // RBhrs_2,5.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4347: pañcadhāpi rater aikyān mukhyas tv eka ihoditaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4348: saptadhātra tathā gauṇa iti bhakti-raso 'ṣṭadhā // RBhrs_2,5.114 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4350: mukhyas tu pañcadhā śāntaḥ prītaḥ preyāṃś ca vatsalaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4351: madhuraś cety amī jñeyā yathā-pūrvam anuttamāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.115 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4353: hāsyo 'dbhutas tathā vīraḥ karuṇo raudra ity api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4354: bhayānakaḥ sa bībhatsa iti gauṇaś ca saptadhā // RBhrs_2,5.116 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4356: vastutas tu purāṇādau pañcadhaiva vilokyate // RBhrs_2,5.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4358: gauro dhūmras tathā raktaḥ kālo nītaḥ kramād amī // RBhrs_2,5.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4360: balaḥ kūrmas tathā kalkī rāghavo bhārgavaḥ kiriḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4361: mīna ity eṣu kathitāḥ kramād dvādaśa devatāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4364: pūrtiḥ śānte vikāśas tu prītādiṣv api pañcasu /
GR14ruphbr_u:4366: bhayānake 'tha bībhatse kṣobho dhīrair udāhṛtaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4369: pratīyamānā apy ajñair grāmyaiḥ sapadi duḥkhavat /
GR14ruphbr_u:4370: karuṇādyā rasāḥ prājñaiḥ prauḍhānanda-mayā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.123 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4372: sad-uktyā ca sukhaṃ tebhyaḥ syāt suvyaktam iti sthitiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4374: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yat paraṃ sukham /
GR14ruphbr_u:4375: sucetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam // RBhrs_2,5.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4379: prītyā rāmāyaṇaṃ nityaṃ hanumān śṛṇuyāt katham // RBhrs_2,5.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4381: sañcārī syāt samāno vā kṛṣṇa-ratyāḥ suhṛd-ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4382: adhikā puṣyamāṇā ced bhāvollāsā ratiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.128 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4385: ity eṣa bhakti-rasikaś caurād iva mahā-nidhiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4390: hṛdi sattvojjvale bāḍhaṃ svadate sa raso mataḥ // RBhrs_2,5.132 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4392: bhāvyate gāḍha-saṃskāraiś citte bhāvaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,5.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4405: sa mayi sanātana-mūrtis tanotu puruṣottamas tuṣṭim // RBhrs_3,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4407: mukhyo bhakti-rasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāntādīr īryate // RBhrs_3,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4409: athāmī pañca lakṣyante rasāḥ śāntādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_3,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4412: sthāyī śānti-ratir dhīraiḥ śānta-bhakti-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4413: prāyaḥ sva-sukha-jātīyaṃ sukhaṃ syād atra yoginām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4414: kintv ātma-saukhyam aghanaṃ ghanaṃ tv īśam ayaṃ sukham // RBhrs_3,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4418: caturbhujaś ca śāntāś ca asminn ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4425: paramātmā paraṃ brahma śamo dāntaḥ śucir vaśī // RBhrs_3,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4427: vibhur ity ādi guṇavān asminn ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4433: prādhānyāt sanakādīnāṃ rūpaṃ bhaktiś ca kathyate // RBhrs_3,1.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4439: gate kim api vastuni svayam adīpi tāvat sukham /
GR14ruphbr_u:4441: mukunda sukha-cid-ghanā tava babhūva sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ // RBhrs_3,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4444: anujjhita-mumukṣā ye bhajante te tu tāpasāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4448: hṛdi dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ muhur iha mukundābhidham ahaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4449: cidānandaṃ jyotiḥ kṣaṇam iva vineṣyāmi rajanīḥ // RBhrs_3,1.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4457: eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ proktā budhair uddīpanā amī // RBhrs_3,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4466: ityādy uddīpanā sādhāraṇās teṣāṃ kilāśritaiḥ // RBhrs_3,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4476: harer dviṣy api na dveṣo nātibhaktiḥ priyeṣv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4477: siddhatāyās tathā jīvan-mukteś ca bahu-mānitā // RBhrs_3,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4479: maunam ity ādayaḥ śītāḥ syur asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4486: stavādayaś ca dāsādyaiḥ śītāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4500: sāttvikās tu jvalanty eva na tu dīptā bhavanty amī // RBhrs_3,1.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4502: sañcārino 'tra nirvedo dhṛtir harṣo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4508: vṛthā gato bata ciraṃ kālaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4510: atra śānti-ratiḥ sthāyī samā sāndrā ca sā dvidhā // RBhrs_3,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4513: līlayā mayi labdhe 'sya babhūvotkampinī tanuḥ // RBhrs_3,1.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4524: vilocana-camatkṛtiṃ kathaya kiṃ nu nirmāsyati // RBhrs_3,1.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4529: na pratyag-ātmani mano ramate pureva // RBhrs_3,1.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4537: mūrdhnā ruddha-dṛg-aśrubhiḥ pulakito drāg eṣa līna-vrataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4538: akṣṇor aṅganam añjana-tviṣi para-brahmaṇy avāpte mudā
GR14ruphbr_u:4539: mudrābhiḥ prakaṭīkaroty avamatiṃ yogī svarūpa-sthitau // RBhrs_3,1.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4541: prathamaṃ jñāna-niṣṭho 'pi so 'traiva ratim udvahet // RBhrs_3,1.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4548: eṣa bhakti-rasānanda-nipuṇaḥ syād yathā śukaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4550: śānty-ākhyāyā rater atra svīkārān na virudhyate // RBhrs_3,1.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4552: tan-niṣṭhā durghaṭā buddher etāṃ śānta-ratiṃ vinā // RBhrs_3,1.47 // {*11.19.36}
GR14ruphbr_u:4555: nāsti yatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4556: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4560: śāntam eva rasaṃ pūrve prāhur ekam anekadhā // RBhrs_3,1.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4561: nirvedo viṣaye sthāyi tattva-jñānodbhavaḥ sa cet /
GR14ruphbr_u:4571: śāntatvenāyam evāddhā sudevādyaiś ca varṇitaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4573: nītā cetasi bhaktānāṃ prīti-bhakti-raso mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4574: anugrāhyasya dāsatvāl lālyatvād apy ayaṃ dvidhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4575: bhidyate sambhrama-prīto gaurava-prīta ity api // RBhrs_3,2.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4579: hariś ca tasya dāsāś ca jñeyā ālambanā iha // RBhrs_3,2.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4582: anyatra dvi-bhujaḥ kvāpi kutrāpy eṣu catur-bhujaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4587: prabhur divi divaukaso bhuvi dhinoti naḥ kiṅkarān // RBhrs_3,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4596: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaś caturbhir bhujaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4598: māṃ vyasmārayad eṣa kaṃsa-vijayī vaikuṇṭha-goṣṭhī-śriyam // RBhrs_3,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4606: vadānyas tejasā yuktaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kīrti-saṃśrayaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4607: varīyān balavān prema-vaśya ity ādibhir guṇaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4608: yutaś catur-vidheṣv eṣa dāseṣv ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,2.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4620: rūpaṃ prasiddham evaiṣāṃ tena bhaktir udīryate // RBhrs_3,2.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4622: kā paryety ambikeyaṃ harim avakalayan kampate kaḥ śiro 'sau
GR14ruphbr_u:4623: taṃ kaḥ stauty eṣa dhātā praṇamati viluṭhan kaḥ kṣitau vāsavo 'yam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4624: kaḥ stabdho hasyate 'ddhā danujabhid-anujaiḥ pūrvajo 'yaṃ mametthaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4625: kālindī jāmbavatyāṃ tridaśa-paricayaṃ jāla-randhrād vyatānīt // RBhrs_3,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4627: te śaraṇyā jñāni-carāḥ sevā-niṣṭhās tridhāśritāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4629: kecid bhītāḥ śaraṇam abhitaḥ saṃśrayante bhavantaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4631: śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ tava nava-navāṃ mādhurīṃ sādhu-vṛndād
GR14ruphbr_u:4632: vṛndāraṇyotsava kila vayaṃ deva sevemahi tvām // RBhrs_3,2.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4641: kāmādīnāṃ kati na katidhā pālitā durnideśās
GR14ruphbr_u:4642: teṣāṃ jātā mayi na karuṇā na trapā nopaśāntiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4644: tvām āyātaḥ śaraṇam abhayaṃ māṃ niyuṅkṣvātma-dāsye // RBhrs_3,2.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4646: ye mumukṣāṃ parityajya harim eva samāśritāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4647: śaunaka-pramukhās te tu proktā jñāni-carāḥ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4652: kṛtādya no yena kṛśā mumukṣā // RBhrs_3,2.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4654: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4661: ikṣvākuḥ śrutadevāś ca puṇḍarīkādayaś ca te // RBhrs_3,2.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4664: śūnyodyāne nayati vihagān apy alaṃ bhikṣu-caryām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4665: ity utkarṣaṃ kam api sa-camatkāram ākarṇya citraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4666: sevāyāṃ te sphuṭam aghahara śraddhayā gardhito 'smi // RBhrs_3,2.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4668: uddhavo dāruko jaitraḥ śrutadevaś ca śatrujit /
GR14ruphbr_u:4671: tathāpi kvāpy avasare paricaryāṃ ca kurvate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4682: dvāri dvāravatī-purasya purataḥ sevotsukas tiṣṭhati // RBhrs_3,2.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4683: eteṣāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān uddhavaḥ prema-viklavaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4688: mukhyaṃ pāriṣadeṣu bhakti-laharī-ruddhaṃ bhajāmy uddhavam // RBhrs_3,2.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4692: mantraṃ pṛcchati mām apeśala-dhiyaṃ vijñāna-vārāṃ nidhir
GR14ruphbr_u:4693: vikrīḍaty asakṛd vicitra-caritaḥ so 'yaṃ prabhur mādṛśām // RBhrs_3,2.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4696: purasthāś ca vrajasthāś cety ucyate anugā dvidhā // RBhrs_3,2.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4708: ānandaś candrahāsaś ca payodo vakulas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4709: rasadaḥ śāradādyāś ca vrajasthā anugā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4717: varair agurubhir jalaṃ racaya vāsitaṃ vārida /
GR14ruphbr_u:4719: parāga-paṭalī gavāṃ diśam arundha paurandarīm // RBhrs_3,2.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4720: vrajānugeṣu sarveṣu varīyān raktako mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4731: dhūryo dhīraś ca vīraś ca tridhā pāriṣad-ādikaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4734: yaḥ prītiṃ tanute bhaktaḥ sa dhūrya iha kīrtyate // RBhrs_3,2.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4736: devaḥ sevyatayā yathā sphurati me devyas tathāsya priyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4738: smṛtvā sāhasikaṃ bibhemi tam ahaṃ bhaktābhimānonnataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4739: prītiṃ tat-praṇate khare 'py avidadhad yaḥ svāsthyam ālambate // RBhrs_3,2.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4742: tasya prasāda-pātraṃ syān mukhyaṃ dhīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4749: kṛpāṃ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṃ nānyam apekṣate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4750: atulāṃ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṃ vīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4752: pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
GR14ruphbr_u:4753: kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4755: priyā pariṣad-agrimāṃ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api // RBhrs_3,2.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4760: sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā // RBhrs_3,2.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4762: nitya-siddhāś ca siddhāś ca sādhakāḥ parikīrtitaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4766: ity ādayo vibhāvāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4768: kṛṣṇasya paśyata kṛpāṃ kṛpādyāḥ kṛpaṇe mayi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4769: dhyeyo 'sau nidhane hanta dṛśor adhvānam abhyagāt // RBhrs_3,2.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4772: tad-aṅga-saurabhādyās tu sarvaiḥ sādhāraṇā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4777: citraṃ vāri-dharān vināpi tarasā yair adya dhārā-mayair
GR14ruphbr_u:4778: dūrāt paśyata deva-mātṛkam abhūd vṛndāṭavī-maṇḍalam // RBhrs_3,2.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4782: tan-niṣṭhādyāḥ śītāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4789: virāgādyāś ca ye śītāḥ proktāḥ sādhāraṇās tu te // RBhrs_3,2.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4793: natvā munīṃś ca saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha // RBhrs_3,2.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4800: stambhādyāḥ sāttvikāḥ sarve prītādi-tritaye matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4813: dainyaṃ cintā smṛtiḥ śaṅkā matir autsukya-cāpale // RBhrs_3,2.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4815: bodhaḥ svapnaḥ klamo vyādhir mṛtiś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4817: yoge trayaḥ syur dhṛty-antā ayoge tu klamādayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4818: ubhayatra pare śeṣā nirvedādyāḥ satāṃ matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4830: ādhis tad-virahe deva grīṣme sara ivāṃśumān // RBhrs_3,2.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4832: dhanyāḥ sphurati tava sūrya karāḥ sahasraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4835: dūre muhūrtam api yā na vilokate tam // RBhrs_3,2.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4839: eṣā rase 'tra kathitā sthāyi-bhāvatayā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4841: tatra pāriṣadādes tu hetuḥ saṃskāra eva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4844: vṛddhiṃ premā tataḥ snehas tato rāga iti tridhā // RBhrs_3,2.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4847: mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4851: kadā namaskariṣāmi gopa-rūpaṃ tam īśvaram // RBhrs_3,2.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4857: naya māṃ vikṛtir na hi me tvat-pada-kamalāvalambasya // RBhrs_3,2.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4862: arajyata sa mayy aho dviguṇam eva vairocaniḥ // RBhrs_3,2.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4864: sāndraś citta-dravaṃ kurvan premā sneha itīryate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4865: kṣaṇikasyāpi neha syād visleṣasya sahiṣṇutā // RBhrs_3,2.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4870: citrā na te dāruka dāru-kalpatā // RBhrs_3,2.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4872: patnīṃ ratna-nidheḥ parām upaharan pūreṇa bāṣpāmbhasāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4875: stabdho 'py abhyadhikāṃ śriyaṃ praṇamatāṃ vṛndād dadhāroddhavaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.86 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4877: snehaḥ sa rāgo yena syāt sukhaṃ duḥkham api sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4878: tat-sambandha-lave 'py atra prītiḥ prāṇa-vyayair api // RBhrs_3,2.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4880: gurur api bhujagād bhīs takṣakāt prājya-rājya-
GR14ruphbr_u:4881: cyutir atiśayinī ca prāya-caryā ca gurvī /
GR14ruphbr_u:4889: prāya ādya-dvaye premā snehaḥ pāriṣadeṣv asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4890: parīkṣiti bhaved-rāgo dāruke ca tathoddhave // RBhrs_3,2.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4892: asminn abhyudite bhāvaḥ prāyaḥ syāt sakhya-leśa-bhāk // RBhrs_3,2.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4896: ayoga-yogāv etasya prabhedau kathitāv ubhau // RBhrs_3,2.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4898: saṅgābhāvo harer dhīrair ayoga iti kathyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4901: utkaṇṭhitaṃ viyogaś cety ayoge 'pi dvidhocyate // RBhrs_3,2.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4906: pakṣapātena tan-nāmni mṛge padme ca tad-dṛśi // RBhrs_3,2.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4911: mahyaṃ na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4920: hā hanta hā hanta kathaṃ nayāmi // RBhrs_3,2.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4924: mano mama manāg api kvacid anāpnuvan nirvṛtiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4925: kṣaṇārdham api manyate vraja-mahendra varṣa-vrajam // RBhrs_3,2.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4927: Not found in any of the three centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:4934: laghur aghahara kīṭād apy ahaṃ kūṭa-karmā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4940: bhaven na hi yayoḥ padaṃ madhurima-śriyām āspadaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4941: padāmbujanakhāṅkurād api visāri rocis tava // RBhrs_3,2.104 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4946: hari hari niḥśvasato niśāḥ prayāti // RBhrs_3,2.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4949: mac-cāpalaṃ ca tava vā mama vādhigamyam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4959: kṛṣṇa-graha-gṛhītātmā na veda jagad īdṛśam // RBhrs_3,2.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4962: tanuṃ bibhrad bhavyaḥ pratikṛtir ivāste dvija-patiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4964: puraḥ śyāmāmbhode bata vinihitā dṛṣṭir amunā // RBhrs_3,2.109 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4966: nadati kvacid utkaṇṭho vilajjo nṛtyati kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:4969: kvacin naṭati niṣpaṭaṃ kvacid asambhavaṃ stambhate
GR14ruphbr_u:4970: kvacid vihasati sphuṭaṃ kvacid amandam ākrandati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4971: lasaty analasaṃ kvacit kvacid apārtham ārtāyate
GR14ruphbr_u:4982: kṣipata nanu satīrthāś ceṣṭatāṃ prāṇa-haṃsaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4991: adhṛtir jaḍatā vyādhir unmādo mūrcchitaṃ budhaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4994: arāgitā tu sarvasminn adhṛtiḥ kathitā budhaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4995: anye 'ṣṭau prakaṭārthatvāt tāpādyā na hi lakṣitāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5000: taṃ smārayan munipate dahatīha sabhyān // RBhrs_3,2.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5008: kṣaṇadāḥ kṣaṇa-dāyitojjhitā bahulāśve bahulās tadābhavan // RBhrs_3,2.120 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5011: na kila kuṭumbam ihāsti nas trilokyām /
GR14ruphbr_u:5013: kvacid api na vyavatiṣṭhate 'dya cetaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5022: svedāśrubhir na hi paraṃ jalatām avāpur
GR14ruphbr_u:5037: vraja-bhuvi tathā nāsīn nidrā-lavo 'pi yathā purā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5039: satatam adhunā niśceṣṭāṅgās taṭāny adhiśerate // RBhrs_3,2.126 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5044: na kila vasatim ārtāḥ kartum icchanti haṃsāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5045: aśivatvān na ghaṭate bhakte kutrāpy asau mṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5048: kṛṣṇena saṅgamo yas tu sa yoga iti kīrtyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:5049: yoge 'pi kathitaḥ siddhis tuṣṭiḥ sthitir iti tridhā // RBhrs_3,2.129 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5051: utkaṇṭhite hareḥ prāptiḥ siddhir ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_3,2.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5056: mandaṃ mandam aye ka eṣa mathurā-vīthīṃ mitho gāhate // RBhrs_3,2.131 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5061: jāte viyoge kaṃsāreḥ samprāptis tuṣṭir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5069: dāruko dvārakā-dvāri tatra citra-daśāṃ yayau // RBhrs_3,2.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5071: saha-vāso mukundena sthitir nigaditā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.136 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5073: {*This actually appears to be a mix of verses 50-51. Check my comment in Mystic Poetry.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:5079: puras tasya niveśādyā yoge 'mīṣāṃ kriyā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5081: bhavatvam eva niścitya na rasāvasthatāṃ jaguḥ // RBhrs_3,2.139 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5082: iti tāvad asādhīyo yat purāṇeṣu keṣucit /
GR14ruphbr_u:5083: śrīmad-bhāgavate caiṣa prakaṭo dṛśyate rasaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.140 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5088: bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.141 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5095: kintu kālādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt kvacit syāt sīma-laṅghanam // RBhrs_3,2.143 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5098: sā vibhāvādibhiḥ puṣṭā gaurava-prītir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.144 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5100: hariś ca tasya lālyāś ca bhavanty ālambanā iha // RBhrs_3,2.145 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5105: hitam iha nijayāgre ceṣṭayaivātmajān naḥ // RBhrs_3,2.146 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5107: rakṣī lālaka ity ādyair guṇair ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,2.147 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5120: ghrātāś ca mūrdhni parirabhya bhavanty adasrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5121: sāmbādayaḥ kati purā vidadhus tapāṃsi // RBhrs_3,2.150 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5122: rukmiṇī-nandanas teṣu lālyeṣu pravaro mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.151 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5125: janayati janeṣu janaka-bhrāntiṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu rūpeṇa // RBhrs_3,2.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5128: sa eṣa paramo gurur garuḍa-go yadūnāṃ patiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5129: yataḥ kim api lālanaṃ vayam avāpya daroddhurāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5130: purārim api saṅgare guru-ruṣaṃ tiraskurmahe // RBhrs_3,2.153 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5133: lālyānāṃ tu sva-sambandha-sphūrter eva samantataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.154 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5149: bhuvam abhi makarāṅko rāṅkavaṃ svīcakāra // RBhrs_3,2.159 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5157: dvandve dṛśoḥ padam asau kila niṣprakampā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5166: naṭaiś ca hṛṣyadbhir akāri nṛtyam // RBhrs_3,2.164 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5168: dhanyaḥ sāmba bhavān sa-riṅgaṇam ayan pārśve rajaḥ-karbūro
GR14ruphbr_u:5169: yas tātena vikṛṣya vatsalatayā svotsaṅgam āropitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5170: dhiṅ māṃ durbhagam atra śaṅkara-mayair durdaiva-visphūrjitaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5171: prāptā na kṣaṇikāpi lālana-ratiḥ sā yena bālye pituḥ // RBhrs_3,2.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5174: tanmayī lālake prītir gaurava-prītir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.166 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5175: sthāyi-bhāvo 'tra sā caiṣām āmūlāt svayam ucchritā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5176: kañcid viśeṣam āpannā premeti sneha ity api /
GR14ruphbr_u:5177: rāga ity ucyate cātra gaurava-prītir eva sā // RBhrs_3,2.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5181: dhīraḥ paraṃ kim api saṅkucatīṃ jhaṣāṅko
GR14ruphbr_u:5185: karād ākṛṣyaiva prasabham abhimanyāv api hate /
GR14ruphbr_u:5187: prapede kalyāṇī na hi malinimānaṃ lavam api // RBhrs_3,2.169 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5192: nidhehi savidhe pituḥ kathaya vatsa kaḥ sambhramaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.170 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5197: viṣam iva tāṃ tu sudhāṃ sa eva sadyaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.171 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5198: triṣv evāyoga-yogādyā bhedāḥ pūrvavad īritāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.172 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5210: militaḥ śambara-purato madanaḥ purato vilokayan pitaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:5211: ko 'ham iti svaṃ pramadān na dhīr adhīr apy asau veda // RBhrs_3,2.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5214: ajani mudā yadu-nagare sambhrama-bhūmā kumārāṇām // RBhrs_3,2.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5217: vandate pādayor dvandvaṃ pituḥ prati-dinaṃ smaraḥ // RBhrs_3,2.177 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5218: utkaṇṭhita-viyogādye yad yad vistāritaṃ na hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:5219: sambhrama-prītivaj jñeyaṃ tat tad evākhilaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.178 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5225: nītaś citte satāṃ puṣṭiṃ rasaḥ preyān udīryate // RBhrs_3,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5227: hariś ca tad-vayasyāś ca tasminn ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5229: dvibhujatvādi-bhāg atra prāgvad ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5234: vrajād aghaharo haraty ahaha naḥ sakhīnāṃ manaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5237: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaṃ caturbhir bhujaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5244: sukhī varīyān ity ādyā guṇās tasyeha kīrtitā // RBhrs_3,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5253: te pura-vraja-sambandhād dvi-vidhāḥ prāya īritāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5255: arjuno bhīmasenaś ca duhitā drupadasya ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:5258: śirasi nṛpatir drag aghrāsīd aghārim adhīra-dhīr
GR14ruphbr_u:5261: tam avaśādhiyaḥ prauḍhānandād arundhata pāṇḍavāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5276: ataḥ sarva-vayasyeṣu pradhānatvaṃ bhajanty amī // RBhrs_3,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5281: sadā praṇaya-śālinaḥ sahacarā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5283: unnidrasya yayus tavātra viratiṃ sapta-kṣapās tiṣṭhato
GR14ruphbr_u:5284: hanta śrānta ivāsi nikṣipa sakhe śrīdāma-pāṇau girim /
GR14ruphbr_u:5285: ādhir vidhyati nas tvam arpaya kare kiṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇe
GR14ruphbr_u:5286: doṣṇas te karavāma kāmam adhunā savyasya saṃvāhanam // RBhrs_3,3.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5296: kṣaṇam aham avasīdan śūnya-cittas tadāsam // RBhrs_3,3.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5297: suhṛdaś ca sakhāyaś ca tathā priya-sakhāḥ pare /
GR14ruphbr_u:5298: priya-narma-vayasyāś cety uktā goṣṭhe catur-vidhāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5301: sāyudhās tasya duṣṭebhyaḥ sadā rakṣā-parāyaṇāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5304: vijayo balabhadrādyāḥ suhṛdas tasya kīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5306: dhunvan dhāvasi maṇḍalāgram amalaṃ tvaṃ maṇḍalībhadra kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5307: gurvīṃ nārya gadāṃ gṛhāṇa vijaya kṣobhaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5308: śaktiṃ na kṣipa bhadravardhana puro govardhanaṃ gāhate
GR14ruphbr_u:5309: garjann eṣa ghano balī na tu balīvardākṛtir dānavaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5316: sukhaṃ svapitu naḥ suhṛd vraja-niśānta-madhye niśi /
GR14ruphbr_u:5317: ahaṃ śirasi mardanaṃ mṛdu karomi karṇe kathāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5318: tvam asya visṛjann alaṃ subala sakthinī lālaya // RBhrs_3,3.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5327: iti subala girā me sandiśa tvaṃ mukundaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5338: yad ugra-bhuja-saṅgare gurum agāt klamaṃ naḥ sakhā // RBhrs_3,3.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5339: sarveṣu sakhiṣu śreṣṭho devaprastho 'yam īritaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5346: śrīdāmnaḥ pṛthulāṃ bhujām abhi śiro vinyasya viśrāmiṇaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5348: madhye sundari kandarasya padayoḥ saṃvāhanena priyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5349: devaprastha itaḥ kṛtī sukhayati premṇā vrajendrātmajam // RBhrs_3,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5352: śrīdāmā ca sudāmā ca dāmā ca vasudāmakaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5359: prasārya bhujayor yugaṃ pulaki kaścid āśliṣyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:5360: kareṇa calatā dṛśau nibhṛtam etya rundhe paraḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5361: kṛśāṅgi sukhayanty amī priya-sakhāḥ sakhāyaṃ tava // RBhrs_3,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5362: eṣu priya-vayasyeṣu śrīdāmā pravaro mataḥ // RBhrs_3,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5369: tvaṃ naḥ projjhya kaṭhora yāmuna-taṭe kasmād akasmād gato
GR14ruphbr_u:5370: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭim ito 'si hanta niviḍāśleṣaiḥ sakhīn prīṇaya /
GR14ruphbr_u:5371: brūmaḥ satyam adarśane tava manāk kā dhenavaḥ ke vayaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5372: kiṃ goṣṭhaṃ kim abhīṣṭam ity acirataḥ sarvaṃ viparyasyati // RBhrs_3,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5378: rādhā-sandeśa-vṛndaṃ kathayati subalaḥ paśya kṛṣṇasya karṇe
GR14ruphbr_u:5380: pālī-tāmbūlam āsye vitarati caturaḥ kokilo mūrdhni dhatte
GR14ruphbr_u:5381: tārā-dāmeti narma-praṇayi-sahacarās tanvi tanvanti sevām // RBhrs_3,3.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5400: dūtaḥ sameti sakhi yatra milaty adūre /
GR14ruphbr_u:5402: kā vā vṛṣasyati na gopa-vṛṣaṃ kiśorī // RBhrs_3,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5408: tad iyam aghahara tvām eti sarvādhvanaiva // RBhrs_3,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5409: eteṣu ke 'pi śāstreṣu ke 'pi lokeṣu viśrutāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5410: nitya-priyāḥ sura-carāḥ sādhakāś ceti te tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5411: kecid eṣu sthirā jātyā mantrivat tam upāsate // RBhrs_3,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5413: kecid ārjava-sāreṇa saralāḥ śīlayanti tam // RBhrs_3,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5416: saumyāḥ sūnṛtayā vācā dhanyā dhinvanti taṃ pare // RBhrs_3,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5417: evaṃ vividhayā sarve prakṛtyā madhurā amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:5427: kaumāraṃ vatsale vācyaṃ tataḥ saṅkṣipya likhyate // RBhrs_3,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5429: bibhrad veṇuṃ jaṭhara-paṭayoḥ śṛṅga-vetre ca kakṣe
GR14ruphbr_u:5431: tiṣṭhan madhye sva-parisuhṛdo hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5432: svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajña-bhug bāla-keliḥ // RBhrs_3,3.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5434: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ paugaṇḍaṃ ca tridhā bhavet // RBhrs_3,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5437: kambu-grīvodgamādyaṃ ca paugaṇḍe prathame sati // RBhrs_3,3.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5439: tundaṃ vindati te mukunda śanakair aśvattha-patra-śriyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5440: kaṇṭhaṃ kambuvad ambujākṣa bhajate rekhā-trayīm ujjvalām /
GR14ruphbr_u:5442: lakṣmīr ādhunikī dhinoti suhṛdām akṣīṇi sā kāpy asau // RBhrs_3,3.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5450: karṇābhyāṃ karṇikāre dadhad alam urasā phulla-mallīka-mālyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5451: nṛtyan dor-yuddha-raṅge naṭavad iha sakhīn nandayaty eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5454: pārśvādy-aṅgaṃ suvalitaṃ paugaṇḍe sati madhyame // RBhrs_3,3.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5462: bhāṇḍīre krīḍanaṃ śailoddhāraṇādyaṃ ca ceṣṭitam // RBhrs_3,3.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5467: paśya krīḍan sukhayati sakhe mitra-vṛndaṃ mukundaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5472: aṃsayos tuṅgatety ādi paugaṇḍe carame sati // RBhrs_3,3.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5477: nyasyann eva priya-savayasāṃ gokulān nirjihīte // RBhrs_3,3.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5483: veṣaḥ keśava peśalaḥ subalam apy āghūrṇayaty adya te
GR14ruphbr_u:5484: vikrāntaṃ kim uta svabhāva-mṛdulāṃ goṣṭhābalānāṃ tatim // RBhrs_3,3.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5488: dhūrtas tvaṃ yad avaiṣi hṛd-gatam ataḥ karṇe tava vyāhare
GR14ruphbr_u:5491: pañceṣur jagatāṃ jaye nija-dhurāṃ yatrārpayan mādyati // RBhrs_3,3.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5493: kaiśoraṃ pūrvam evoktaṃ saṅkṣepeṇocyate tataḥ // RBhrs_3,3.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5500: tena yauvana-śobhāsya neha kācit prapañcitā // RBhrs_3,3.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5503: sakhīn kevalam evedaṃ dhāmnā dhīman dhinoti naḥ // RBhrs_3,3.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5508: api nivahāḥ samam eva jāgrati sma // RBhrs_3,3.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5516: pañcāsya paśya muditāḥ pañcāsya-pratimāṃ yayuḥ // RBhrs_3,3.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5521: priya-sakhi subalo 'bhūd vismitaḥ sa-smitaś ca // RBhrs_3,3.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5534: prāyaḥ puraḥsaratvādyāḥ suhṛdām īritāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5541: tābhiḥ keli-kalau sākṣāt sakhyuḥ pakṣa-parigrahaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5545: puras tauryatrikaṃ tasya gavāṃ sambhālana-kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5547: etāḥ sādhāraṇā dāsair vayasyānāṃ kriyā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5548: pūrvokteṣv aparāś cātra jñeyā dhīrair yathocitam // RBhrs_3,3.96 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5561: api guru-puras tvām utsaṅge nidhāya visaṅkaṭe
GR14ruphbr_u:5563: praṇayati tava skandhe cāsau bhujaṃ bhujagopamaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5564: kva subala purā siddha-kṣetre cakatha kiyat-tapaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.99 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5577: rase preyasi bhāva-jñaiḥ kathitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5578: tatrāyoge madaṃ harṣaṃ garvaṃ nidrāṃ dhṛtiṃ vinā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5579: yoge mṛtiṃ klamaṃ vyādhiṃ vināpasmṛti-dīnate // RBhrs_3,3.103 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5586: vimukta-sambhramā yā syād viśrambhātmā ratir dvayoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5587: prāyaḥ samānayor atra sā sakhya-sthāyi-śabda-bhāk // RBhrs_3,3.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5589: eṣā sakhya-ratir vṛddhiṃ gacchantī praṇayaḥ kramāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:5590: premā snehas tathā rāga iti pañca-bhidoditā // RBhrs_3,3.106 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5593: garuḍāṅka guḍākeśas tvāṃ kadā parirapsyate // RBhrs_3,3.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5596: tad-gandhenāpy asaṃspṛṣṭā ratiḥ praṇaya ucyate // RBhrs_3,3.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5601: samaskuruta pāṃśumān śirasi candrakān arjunaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.109 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5604: mukunda vasatir vane para-gṛhe ca dāsya-kriyā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5605: iyaṃ sphuṭam amaṅgalā bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ gatiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5606: parantu vavṛdhe tvayi dvi-guṇam eva sakhyāmṛtam // RBhrs_3,3.110 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5609: gāyanti sma mahārāja sneha-klinna-dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ // RBhrs_3,3.111 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5613: yā prāg āsta sarasvatī drutam asau līnopakaṇṭha-sthale
GR14ruphbr_u:5614: yā nāsīd udagād dṛśoḥ pathi sadā nīrorudhāvātra sā // RBhrs_3,3.112 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5630: davasya kavalād api tvam avitātra yeṣām abhūḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5632: kathaṃ na viraha-jvarād avasitān sakhīn adya naḥ // RBhrs_3,3.116 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5633: atrāpi pūrvavat proktās tāpādyās tā daśā daśa // RBhrs_3,3.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5638: balīyān uttāpas tava viraha-janmā jvalayati // RBhrs_3,3.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5643: samīrasya ghrānādhvani pṛthulatā kevalam abhūt // RBhrs_3,3.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5652: na hi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhajati caṭulaṃ tulam iva me
GR14ruphbr_u:5653: nirālambaṃ cetaḥ kvacid api vilambaṃ lavam api // RBhrs_3,3.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5657: kim aparam iha vācyaṃ jīvite 'py adya dhatte
GR14ruphbr_u:5658: yaduvara virahāt te nārthitāṃ bandhu-vargaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.122 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5663: sphurati suhṛdāṃ gaṇāḥ śikhara-jāta-vṛkṣā iva // RBhrs_3,3.123 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5666: yaduvīra taṭe viceṣṭate ciram ābhīra-kumāra-maṇḍalī // RBhrs_3,3.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5670: luṇṭhanti bhuvi śerate bata hasanti dhāvanty amī
GR14ruphbr_u:5671: rudanti mathurā-pate kim api vallavānāṃ gaṇāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5680: vāraṃ vāram akharva-locana-jalair āplāvya tān niścalān
GR14ruphbr_u:5681: śocanty adya yathā ciraṃ paricaya-snigdhāḥ kuraṅgā api // RBhrs_3,3.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5683: kṛṣṇena viprayogaḥ syān na jātu vraja-vāsinām // RBhrs_3,3.128 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5685: vatsair vatsatarībhiś ca sadā krīḍati mādhavaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5689: citrākāraṃ bhajann eva mitrākāram adarśayat // RBhrs_3,3.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5704: kiṃ varṇyate diṣṭam ato vrajaukasām // RBhrs_3,3.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5706: preyān kām api puṣṇāti rasaś citta-camatkṛtim // RBhrs_3,3.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5707: prīte ca vatsale cāpi kṛṣṇa-tad-bhaktayoḥ punaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5709: preyān eva bhavet preyān ataḥ sarva-raseṣv ayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:5715: vibhāvādyais tu vātsalyaṃ sthāyī puṣṭim upāgataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5716: eṣa vatsala-nāmātra prokto bhakti-raso budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5718: kṛṣṇaṃ tasya gurūṃś cātra prāhur ālambanān budhāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5726: dātety-ādi-guṇo kṛṣṇo vibhāva iti kathyate // RBhrs_3,4.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5730: trayyā copaniṣadbhiś ca sāṅkhya-yogaiś ca sātvataiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5733: viṣṇur nityam upāsyate sakhi mayā tenātra nītāḥ kṣayaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5735: pratyakṣaṃ girir eṣa goṣṭa-patinā rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ dhṛtas
GR14ruphbr_u:5736: tat-tat-karma duranvayaṃ mama śiśoḥ kenāsya sambhāvyate // RBhrs_3,4.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5739: lālakatvādināpy atra vibhāvā guravo matāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5745: te tu tasyātra kathitā vraja-rājñī vrajeśvaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5746: rohiṇī tāś ca vallavyo yāḥ padmaja-hṛtātmajāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5760: śyāma-śyāma-rucir vicitra-sicayā goṣṭheśvarī pātu vaḥ // RBhrs_3,4.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5764: snuvānā pratyūṣe diśati ca bhuje kārmaṇam asau
GR14ruphbr_u:5780: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaumāraṃ tri-vidhaṃ matam // RBhrs_3,4.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5783: pravyakta-mārdavatvaṃ ca kaumāre prathame sati // RBhrs_3,4.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5794: kṣaṇam iha virudantaṃ smera-vaktraṃ kṣaṇaṃ sā
GR14ruphbr_u:5795: tilam api viratāsīn nekṣituṃ goṣṭha-rājñī // RBhrs_3,4.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5797: paṭṭa-ḍorī kaṭau haste sūtram ity ādi maṇḍanam // RBhrs_3,4.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5802: vrajeśa-gṛhiṇī sutaṃ na kila vīkṣya tṛptiṃ yayau // RBhrs_3,4.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5805: kalokti-riṅganādyaṃ ca kaumāre sati madhyame // RBhrs_3,4.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5810: tanayam amṛta-sindhau prekṣya mātā nyamāṅkṣīt // RBhrs_3,4.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5812: kiṅkiṇy-ādi ca kaṭyādau prasādhanam ihoditam // RBhrs_3,4.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5819: atra kiñcit kṛśaṃ madhyam īṣat-prathima-bhāg uraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5820: śiraś ca kāka-pakṣāḍhyaṃ kaumāre carame sati // RBhrs_3,4.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5832: kare ca laguḍīṃ laghuṃ savayasāṃ kulair āvṛtaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5833: avann iha śakṛt-karīn parisare vrajasya priye
GR14ruphbr_u:5834: sutas tava kṛtārthayaty ahaha paśya netrāṇi naḥ // RBhrs_3,4.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5836: paugaṇḍādi puraivoktaṃ tena saṅkṣipya likhyate // RBhrs_3,4.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5841: vraja-bhuvi mama vatsaḥ kacca-deśād upaiti // RBhrs_3,4.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5855: mātuḥ pramoda-bharam eva haris tanoti // RBhrs_3,4.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5857: prekṣya prekṣya diśaḥ sa-śaṅkam asakṛn mandaṃ padaṃ nikṣipan
GR14ruphbr_u:5858: nāyāty eṣa latāntare sphuṭam ito gavyaṃ hariṣyan hariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5860: trasyal-locanam asya śuṣyad-adharaṃ ramyaṃ didṛkṣe mukham // RBhrs_3,4.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5870: ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te // RBhrs_3,4.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5877: upālambhādayaś cātra mitraiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5879: navātra sāttvikāḥ stanya-srāvaḥ stambhādayaś ca te // RBhrs_3,4.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5885: matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan // RBhrs_3,4.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5890: tava navam abhiṣekaṃ dugdha-pūraiḥ karoti // RBhrs_3,4.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5892: katham api parirabdhuṃ na kṣamā stabdha-gātrī
GR14ruphbr_u:5894: na ca sutam upadeṣṭuṃ ruddha-kaṇṭhī samarthā
GR14ruphbr_u:5895: dadhatam acalam āsīd vyākulā gokuleśā // RBhrs_3,4.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5909: ratiḥ saivātra vātsalyaṃ sthāyī bhāvo nigadyate // RBhrs_3,4.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5911: premavat snehavad bhāti kadācit kila rāgavat // RBhrs_3,4.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5915: mūrdhny upāghrāya paramāṃ mudaṃ lebhe kurūdvaha // RBhrs_3,4.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5919: gehād aṅganam aṅganāt punar asau gehaṃ viśanty ākulā
GR14ruphbr_u:5920: govindasya muhur vrajendra-gṛhiṇī panthānam ālokate // RBhrs_3,4.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5930: premā vallava-nāthayor atitarām ullāsam evāyayau // RBhrs_3,4.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5935: vṛttāsi vraja-rājñi tat-suta-mukha-prekṣāṃ sphuṭaṃ vāñchasi // RBhrs_3,4.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5940: sthitā yadi na tatra te vadana-padmam udvīkṣyate // RBhrs_3,4.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5956: paśya srasta-tanuḥ kaṭhora-luṭhanair dehe vraṇaṃ kurvatī /
GR14ruphbr_u:5957: kṣīṇā goṣṭha-mahī-mahendra-mahiṣī hā putra putrety asau
GR14ruphbr_u:5958: krośantī karayor yugena kurute kaṣṭād uras-tāḍanam // RBhrs_3,4.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5959: bahūnām api sad-bhāve viyoge 'tra tu kecana /
GR14ruphbr_u:5961: unmāda-mohāv ity ādyā atyudrekaṃ vrajanty amī // RBhrs_3,4.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5963: manda-spandam abhūt klamair alaghubhiḥ sandānitaṃ mānasaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5965: niśvāsaiḥ sravad eva pākam ayate stanyaṃ ca taptair idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5971: śirasi kuliśaṃ hanta kṣiptaṃ śvaphalka-sutena me // RBhrs_3,4.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5973: dhig astu hata-jīvitaṃ niravadhi-śriyo 'py adya me
GR14ruphbr_u:5974: yayā na hi hareḥ śiraḥ snuta-kucāgram āghrāyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:5975: sadā nava-sudhā-duhām api gavāṃ parārdhaṃ ca dhik
GR14ruphbr_u:5976: sa luñcati na cañcalaḥ surabhi-gandhi yāsāṃ dadhi // RBhrs_3,4.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5988: kim iva kurute harmye tiṣṭhann ayaṃ nirapatrapo
GR14ruphbr_u:5989: vrajapatir iti brūte mugdho 'yam atra mudā janaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5990: ahaha tanayaṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ parihṛtya taṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5991: kaṭhina-hṛdayo goṣṭhe svairī praviśya sukhīyati // RBhrs_3,4.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5993: kva me putro nīpāḥ kathayata kuraṅgāḥ kim iha vaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5994: sa babhrāmābhyarṇe bhaṇata tam udantaṃ madhukarāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5996: bhavantaṃ pṛcchantī diśi diśi yaśodā vicarati // RBhrs_3,4.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5998: kuṭumbini manas taṭe vidhuratāṃ vidhatse kathaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5999: prasāraya dṛśaṃ manāk tava sutaḥ puro vartate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6000: idaṃ gṛhiṇi gṛhaṃ na kuru śūnyam ity ākulaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6001: sa śocati tava prasūṃ yadu-kulendra nandaḥ pitā // RBhrs_3,4.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6019: tava muhur atiharṣād varṣati kṣīra-dhārām // RBhrs_3,4.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6020: svīkurvate rasam imaṃ nāṭya-jñā api kecana // RBhrs_3,4.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6022: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6026: preyasas tu tirobhāvo vatsalaysāsya na kṣatiḥ // RBhrs_3,4.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6028: tatra keṣucid apy asyāḥ saṅkulatvam udīryate // RBhrs_3,4.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6030: yudhiṣṭhirasya vātsalyaṃ prītyā sakhyena cānvitam // RBhrs_3,4.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6036: evaṃ keṣucid anyeṣu vijñeyaṃ bhāva-miśraṇam // RBhrs_3,4.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6041: ātmocitair vibhāvādyaiḥ puṣṭiṃ nītā satāṃ hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6042: madhurākhyo bhaved bhakti-raso 'sau madhurā ratiḥ // RBhrs_3,5.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6044: rahasyatvāc ca saṃkṣipya vitatāṇgo vilikhyate // RBhrs_3,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6046: asmin ālambanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ priyās tasya tu subhruvaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6049: āśrayatvena madhure harir ālambano mataḥ // RBhrs_3,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6054: śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati // RBhrs_3,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6060: preyasīṣu harer āsu pravarā vārṣabhānavī // RBhrs_3,5.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6069: rādhā lāghavam apy anādara-girāṃ bhaṅgībhir ātanvatī
GR14ruphbr_u:6070: maitrī-gauravato 'py asau śata-guṇāṃ mat-prītim evādadhe // RBhrs_3,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6074: rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ // RBhrs_3,5.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6089: krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe // RBhrs_3,5.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6097: ālasyaugrye vinā sarve vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6103: nālambituṃ katham api kṣamate 'dya jīvaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6110: sthāyī bhāvo bhavaty atra pūrvoktā madhurā ratiḥ // RBhrs_3,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6116: rādhā-mādhavayor eva kvāpi bhāvaiḥ kadāpy asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:6119: ito dūre rājñī sphurati parito mitra-paṭalī
GR14ruphbr_u:6120: dṛśor agre candrāvalir upari śailasya danujaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6122: anta-śrīr lolā taḍid iva mukundasya valate // RBhrs_3,5.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6123: ghorā khaṇḍita-śaṅkhacūḍam ajiraṃ rundhe śivā tāmasī
GR14ruphbr_u:6126: rādhāyās tad api praphullam abhajan mlāniṃ na bhāvāmbujam // RBhrs_3,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6129: sa pūrva-rāgo mānaś ca pravāsādi-mayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6130: vipralambho bahu-vidho vidvadbhir iha kathyate // RBhrs_3,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6132: prāg-asaṅgatayor bhāvaḥ pūrva-rāgo bhaved dvayoḥ // RBhrs_3,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6134: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6136: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6137: mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛha-kṛtyo na lagate // RBhrs_3,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6139: yathā vinidrā yac cittā rukmiṇī kamalekṣaṇā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6140: tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6141: vedāhaṃ rukmiṇyā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6148: mukhara-nikhare līnā dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm // RBhrs_3,5.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6158: na bhuṅkte na svapiti ca cintayan vo hy aharniśam // RBhrs_3,5.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6160: dvayor militayor bhogaḥ sambhoga iti kīrtyate // RBhrs_3,5.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6178: tanutāṃ sanātanātmā bhagavān mayi sarvadā tuṣṭim // RBhrs_4,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6180: rasaḥ sapta-vidho gauṇo maitrī-vaira-sthitir mithaḥ // RBhrs_4,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6181: rasābhāsāś ca tenātra laharyo nava kīrtitāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6182: prāg atrāniyatādhārāḥ kadācit kvāpy uditvarāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6183: gauṇā bhakti-rasāḥ sapta lekhyā hāsyādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_4,1.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6184: bhaktānāṃ pañcadhoktānām eṣāṃ madhyata eva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6185: kvāpy ekaḥ kvāpy anekaś ca gauṇeṣv ālambano mataḥ // RBhrs_4,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6188: hāsya-bhakti-raso nāma budhair eṣa nigadyate // RBhrs_4,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6190: vṛddhāḥ śiśu-mukhāḥ prāyaḥ proktā dhīrais tad-āśrayāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6191: vibhāvanādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt pravarāś ca kvacin matāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6193: yāsyāmy asya na bhīṣaṇasya savidhaṃ jīrṇasya śīrṇākṛter
GR14ruphbr_u:6194: mātar neṣyati māṃ pidhāya kapaṭād ādhārikāyām asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:6195: ity uktvā cakitākṣam adbhuta-śiśāv udvīkṣyamāṇe harau
GR14ruphbr_u:6196: hāsyaṃ tasya niruddhato 'py atitarāṃ vyaktaṃ tadāsīn muneḥ // RBhrs_4,1.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6198: yac ceṣṭā kṛṣṇa-viṣayā proktaḥ so 'tra tad-anvayī // RBhrs_4,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6200: dadāmi dadhi-phāṇitaṃ vivṛṇu vaktram ity agrato
GR14ruphbr_u:6202: tayā kusumam arpitaṃ navam avetya bhugnānane
GR14ruphbr_u:6203: harau jahasur uddhuraṃ kim api suṣṭhu goṣṭhārbhakāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6205: asya prekṣya karaṃ śiśor munipate śyāmasya me kathyatāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6206: tathyaṃ hanta cirāyur eṣa bhavitā kiṃ dhenu-koṭīśvaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6207: ity ukte bhagavan mayādya paritaś cīreṇa kiṃ cāruṇā
GR14ruphbr_u:6208: drāg āvirbhavad-uddhura-smitam idaṃ vaktraṃ tvayā rudhyate // RBhrs_4,1.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6213: ṣoḍhā hāsa-ratiḥ syāt smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6214: apahasitātihasitake jyeṣṭhādīnāṃ kramād dve dve // RBhrs_4,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6216: bhaved vihasitādyaṃ ca bhāvajñair iti bhaṇyate // RBhrs_4,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6220: kva yāmi jaratī khalā dadhi-haraṃ didhīrṣanty asau
GR14ruphbr_u:6221: pradhāvati javena māṃ subala maṅkṣu rakṣāṃ kuru /
GR14ruphbr_u:6223: vikasvara-mukhāmbujaṃ kulam abhūn munīnāṃ divi // RBhrs_4,1.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6225: tad eva dara-saṃlakṣya-dantāgraṃ hasitaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_4,1.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6227: mad-vaśena puraḥ-sthito harir asau putro 'ham evāsmi te
GR14ruphbr_u:6229: mām eti skhalad-akṣare jaṭilayā vyākruśya niṣkāsite
GR14ruphbr_u:6230: putre prāṅgataḥ sakhī-kulam abhūd dantāṃśu-dhautādharam // RBhrs_4,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6232: sa-svanaṃ dṛṣṭa-daśanaṃ bhaved vihasitaṃ tu tat // RBhrs_4,1.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6234: muṣāṇa dadhi meduraṃ viphalam antarā śaṅkase
GR14ruphbr_u:6237: kṛtaṃ hasitam utsvanaṃ kapaṭa-suptayā vṛddhayā // RBhrs_4,1.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6241: lagnas te nitarāṃ dṛśor api yuge kiṃ dhātu-rāgo ghanaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6242: prātaḥ putra balasya vā kim asitaṃ vāsas tvayāṅge dhṛtam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6244: dūtī saṅkucad-īkṣaṇāvahasitaṃ jātā na roddhuṃ kṣamā // RBhrs_4,1.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6251: jaratyāḥ prastobhān naṭati tad anaiṣīd dṛśam asau // RBhrs_4,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6253: sahasra-tālaṃ kṣiptāṅgaṃ tac cātihasitaṃ viduḥ // RBhrs_4,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6255: vṛddhe tvaṃ valitānanāsi valibhiḥ prekṣya suyogyām atas
GR14ruphbr_u:6256: tvām udvoḍhum asau balī-mukha-varo māṃ sādhayaty utsukaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6257: ābhir vipluta-dhīr vṛṇe na hi paraṃ tvatto bali-dhvaṃsanād
GR14ruphbr_u:6258: ity uccair mukharā-girā vijahasuḥ sottālikā bālikāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6259: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6264: kā tvattaḥ kuṭile parāsti jaṭilā-putri kṣitau sundarī
GR14ruphbr_u:6265: puṇyena vraja-subhruvāṃ tava dhṛtiṃ hartuṃ na vaṃśī kṣamā // RBhrs_4,1.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6273: sā vismaya-ratir nītād- bhuto-bhakti-raso bhavet // RBhrs_4,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6280: sākṣād anumitaṃ ceti tac ca dvividham ucyate // RBhrs_4,2.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6289: citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak /
GR14ruphbr_u:6290: gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat // RBhrs_4,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6295: khelann iva sphurati hanta kim indra-jālam // RBhrs_4,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6297: yāny akṣipan praharaṇāni bhaṭāḥ sa devaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6303: vatsāś ceti vadan kṛto 'smi vivaśaḥ stambha-śriyā paśyata /
GR14ruphbr_u:6304: āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bhoḥ pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6305: stūyante jagad-aṇḍavadbhir abhitas te hanta padmāsanaiḥ // RBhrs_4,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6311: apriyādeḥ kriyā kuryān nālaukiky api vismayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6312: asādhāraṇy api manāk karoty eva priyasya sā // RBhrs_4,2.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6314: ity atra vismaye proktā raty-anugraha-mādhurī // RBhrs_4,2.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6322: ālambana iha prokta eṣa eva caturvidhaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6323: utsāhas tv eṣa bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām eva sambhavet // RBhrs_4,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6326: sakhā bandhu-viśeṣo vā yuddha-vīra ihocyate // RBhrs_4,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6327: pratiyoddhā mukundo vā tasmin vā prekṣake sthite /
GR14ruphbr_u:6333: yadi na tvaṃ samarāt parāñcasi // RBhrs_4,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6338: śrīdāmnaś ca bakī-dviṣaś ca samarāṭopaḥ paṭīyān abhūt // RBhrs_4,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6341: tathādya laguḍaṃ kramād bhramayati sma dāmā kṛtī /
GR14ruphbr_u:6348: jigāya bharata-śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ // RBhrs_4,3.10 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:6350: pratiyodha-sthitāḥ santo bhavanty uddīpanā iha // RBhrs_4,3.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6353: jitvā dāmodara yudhi vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ katthitāni /
GR14ruphbr_u:6355: mandradhvāno naṭati nikaṭe stokakṛṣṇaḥ kalāpī // RBhrs_4,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6364: divyārgalā pratibhaṭas trapate bhujo me // RBhrs_4,3.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6369: sudāmnaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ jayati muhur āhopuruṣikā // RBhrs_4,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6375: jigīṣā stheyasī yuddhe sā yuddhotsāha īryate // RBhrs_4,3.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6383: mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīḥ kṣudra re bhadrasena /
GR14ruphbr_u:6390: hareḥ pramadam ekakaḥ samiti bhadraseno vyadhāt // RBhrs_4,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6399: sāhāyyam atra subalaḥ kurute balī cej
GR14ruphbr_u:6401: suhṛd eva pratibhaṭo vīre kṛṣṇasya na tvariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6402: sa bhakta-kṣobha-kāritvād raudre tv ālambano rase /
GR14ruphbr_u:6403: rāgābhāvo dṛg-ādīnāṃ raudrād asya vibhedakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6405: dvi-vidho dāna-vīraḥ syād ekas tatra bahu-pradaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6408: sahasā dīyate yena svayaṃ sarvasvam apy uta /
GR14ruphbr_u:6409: dāmodarasya saukhyāya procyate sa bahu-pradaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6415: pragāḍhā stheyasī ditsā dānotsāha itīryate // RBhrs_4,3.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6416: dvidhā bahu-prado 'py eṣa vidvadbhir iha kathyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6417: syād ābhyudayikas tv ekaḥ paras tat-sampradānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6420: arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ sa ābhyudāyiko bhavet // RBhrs_4,3.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6425: iti nijagadur uccair bhūsurā yena tṛptāḥ // RBhrs_4,3.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6428: sarvasvaṃ dīyate yena sa syāt tat-sampradānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6429: tad-dānaṃ prīti-pūjābhyāṃ bhaved ity uditaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_4,3.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6431: prīti-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad dadyād bandhv-ādi-rūpiṇe // RBhrs_4,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6435: dattvā rājyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ svam api bhagavate ditsur apy anyad uccair
GR14ruphbr_u:6436: deyaṃ kutrāpy adṛṣṭvā makha-sadasi tadā vyākulaḥ pāṇḍavo 'bhūt // RBhrs_4,3.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6438: pujā-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad vipra-rūpāya dīyate // RBhrs_4,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6442: sa eva viṣṇur varado 'stu vā paro
GR14ruphbr_u:6443: dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitāṃ mune // RBhrs_4,3.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6446: balinaiva sa yenāsya bhikṣā-pātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6449: hariṇā dīyamāno 'pi sārṣṭy-ādis tuṣyatā varaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6453: atra sañcāritā bhūmnā dhṛter eva samīkṣyate // RBhrs_4,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6455: tyāgecchā tādṛśī prauḍhā tyāgotsāha itīryate // RBhrs_4,3.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6460: svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varaṃ na yāce // RBhrs_4,3.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6463: kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te /
GR14ruphbr_u:6467: dhuryādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya vīrasya padavīṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,3.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6473: āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6474: autsukyam atiharṣādyā jñeyāḥ sañcāriṇo budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6478: vande kuṭmalitāñjalir muhur ahaṃ vīraṃ mayūra-dhvajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6481: sollāsaṃ krakacena dāritam abhūt patnī-sutābhyāṃ śivaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6482: hareś cet tattva-vijñānaṃ naivāsya ghaṭate dayā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6483: tad-abhāve tv asau dāna-vīre 'ntar-bhavati sphuṭam // RBhrs_4,3.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6485: kṛtātra dvija-rūpe ca bhaktis tenāsya bhaktatā // RBhrs_4,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6487: vopadevādayo dhīrā vīram ācakṣate tridhā // RBhrs_4,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6490: prāyeṇa dhīra-śāntas tu dharma-vīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_4,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6494: dharmaikābhiniveśas tu dharmotsāho mataḥ satām // RBhrs_4,3.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6501: dhyātvendrādy-āśrayatvena yad eṣv āhutir arpyate // RBhrs_4,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6502: ayaṃ tu sākṣāt tasyaiva nideśāt kurute makhān /
GR14ruphbr_u:6505: dharma-vīraṃ na manyante katicid dhanikādayaḥ* // RBhrs_4,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6510: ātmocitair vibhāvādyair nītā puṣṭiṃ satāṃ hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6511: bhavec choka-ratir bhakti-raso hi karuṇābhidhaḥ // RBhrs_4,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6513: aniṣṭāpteḥ padatayā vedyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sya ca priyaḥ // RBhrs_4,4.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6515: ity asya viṣayatvena jñeyā ālambanās tridhā // RBhrs_4,4.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6516: tat-tad-vedī ca tad-bhakta āśrayatvena ca tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6525: uktā śoka-ratiḥ saiva sthāyī bhāva ihocyate // RBhrs_4,4.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6536: viṣam agatim avasthāṃ goṣṭha-rājasya rājñī // RBhrs_4,4.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6539: nīlāmbarasya vaktrendur nīlimānaṃ muhur dadhe // RBhrs_4,4.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6544: sa devarṣir muktān api tanu-bhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam // RBhrs_4,4.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6546: mātar mādri gatā kutas tvam adhunā hā kvāsi pāṇḍo pitaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6547: sāndrānanda-sudhābdhir eṣa yuvayor nābhūd dṛśāṃ gocaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6548: ity uccair nakulānujo vilapati prekṣya pramodākulo
GR14ruphbr_u:6550: ratiṃ vināpi ghaṭate hāsyāder udgamaḥ kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:6551: kadācid api śokasya nāsya sambhāvanā bhavet // RBhrs_4,4.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6552: rater bhūmnā kraśimnā ca śoko bhūyān kṛśaś ca saḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6553: ratyā sahāvinā-bhāvāt kāpy etasya viśiṣṭatā // RBhrs_4,4.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6557: ataḥ prādurbhavan śoko labdhāpy udbhaṭatāṃ muhuḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6558: durūhām eva tanute gatiṃ saukhyasya kām api // RBhrs_4,4.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6564: kṛṣṇo hito 'hitaś ceti krodhasya viṣayas tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6566: bhaktāḥ sarva-vidhā eva hite caivāhite tathā // RBhrs_4,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6568: sakhī-krodhe bhavet sakhyāḥ kṛṣṇād atyāhite sati // RBhrs_4,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6570: antaḥ-kleśa-kalaṅkitāḥ kila vayaṃ yāmo 'dya yāmyāṃ purīṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6573: hā medhāvini rādhike tava kathaṃ premā garīyān abhūt // RBhrs_4,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6575: krodho jaratyā vadhv-ādi-sambandhe prekṣite harau // RBhrs_4,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6577: are yuvati-taskara prakaṭam eva vadhvāḥ paṭas
GR14ruphbr_u:6578: tavorasi nirīkṣyate bata na neti kiṃ jalpasi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6579: aho vraja-nivāsinaḥ śṛṇuta kiṃ na vikrośanaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6582: sarveṣām eva govinde ratiḥ prauḍhā virājate // RBhrs_4,5.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6584: hitas tridhānavahitaḥ sāhasī cerṣyur ity api // RBhrs_4,5.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6587: kvacit tatra pramatto yaḥ prokto 'navahito 'tra saḥ // RBhrs_4,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6594: yaḥ prerako bhaya-sthāne sāhasī sa nigadyate // RBhrs_4,5.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6608: ahitaḥ syād dvidhā svasya hareś ceti prabhedataḥ // RBhrs_4,5.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6610: ahitaḥ svasya sa syād yaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandha-bādhakaḥ // RBhrs_4,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6614: iti uttuṅgā mama madhu-pure yātrayā tatra tāsāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6617: ahitas tu hares tasya vairi-pakṣo nigadyate // RBhrs_4,5.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6622: trir asya mukuṭopari sphuṭam udīrya savyaṃ padam // RBhrs_4,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6624: kṛṣṇāhita-hitasthāḥ syur amī uddīpanā iha // RBhrs_4,5.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6630: atra stambhādayaḥ sarve prākaṭyaṃ yānti sāttvikāḥ // RBhrs_4,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6633: atra krodha-ratiḥ sthāyī sa tu krodhas tridhā mataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6634: kopo manyus tathā roṣas tatra kopas tu śatru-gaḥ // RBhrs_4,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6636: roṣas tu dayite strīṇām ato vyabhicaraty asau // RBhrs_4,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6638: dṛg-anta-pāṭalatvādyā roṣe tu kathitāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_4,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6641: mṛdhe magadha-bhūpatau kim api vaktram ākrośati /
GR14ruphbr_u:6644: {*Three syllables missing in the last line. Copyist error or typo?}
GR14ruphbr_u:6646: krośantyāṃ kara-pallavena balavān sadyaḥ pidhatte mukhaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6647: dhāvantyāṃ bhaya-bhāji vistṛta-bhujo rundhe puraḥ paddhatim /
GR14ruphbr_u:6648: pādānte viluṭhaty asau mayi muhur daṣṭādharāyāṃ ruṣā
GR14ruphbr_u:6649: mātaś caṇḍi mayā śikhaṇḍa-mukuṭād ātmābhirakṣyaḥ katham // RBhrs_4,5.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6652: tava girā jaṭile niṭile ca me /
GR14ruphbr_u:6659: kuṭena māṃ tad api vañcayate vadhūṭī // RBhrs_4,5.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6660: asmin na tādṛśo manyau vartate raty-anugrahaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6663: krodho rati-vinābhāvān na bhakti-rasatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,5.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6670: kṛṣṇaś ca dāruṇāś ceti tasminn ālambanā dvidhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6671: anukampyeṣu sāgassu kṛṣṇas tasya ca bandhuṣu // RBhrs_4,6.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6673: darśanāc chravaṇāc ceti smaraṇāc ca prakīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6675: kiṃ śuṣyad-vadano 'pi muñca khacitaṃ citte pṛthuṃ vepathuṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6676: viśvasya prakṛtiṃ bhajasva na manāg apy asti mantuṃ tava /
GR14ruphbr_u:6677: uṣma-mrakṣitam ṛkṣa-rāja rabhasād vistīrya vīryaṃ tvayā
GR14ruphbr_u:6678: pṛthvī pratyuta yuddha-kautuka-mayī sevaiva me nirmitā // RBhrs_4,6.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6680: mura-mathana puras te ko bhujaṅgas tapasvī
GR14ruphbr_u:6681: laghu-haram iti kārṣīr mā sma dīnāya manyum /
GR14ruphbr_u:6683: aśaraṇam atimūḍhaṃ rakṣa rakṣa prasīda // RBhrs_4,6.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6698: vapur atipuruṣaṃ yā ghoram āviścakāra // RBhrs_4,6.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6702: krośanādyāḥ kriyāś cātra sāttvikāś cāśru-varjitāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6705: asmin bhagna-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ syād aparādhataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6706: bhīṣaṇebhyaś ca tatra syād bahudhaivāparādhitā // RBhrs_4,6.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6707: taj-jā bhīr nāparatra syād anugrāhya-janān vinā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6708: ākṛtyā ye prakṛtyā ye ye prabhāveṇa bhīṣaṇāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6713: sadā bhagavato bhītiṃ gatā ātyantikīm api /
GR14ruphbr_u:6714: kaṃsādyā rati-śūnyatvād atra nālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6720: asau bhakti-raso dhīrair bībhatsākhya itīryate // RBhrs_4,7.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6721: asminn āśrita-śāntādyā dhīrair ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,7.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6725: citraṃ so 'yam udīrayan hari-guṇān udbāṣpa-dṛṣṭir jano
GR14ruphbr_u:6726: dṛṣṭe strī-vadane vikūṇita-mukho viṣṭabhya niṣṭhīvati // RBhrs_4,7.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6731: jugupsā-ratir atra syāt sthāyī sā ca vivekajā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6732: prāyikī ceti kathitā jugupsā dvi-vidhā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,7.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6735: vivekotthā tu dehādau jugupsā syād vivekajā // RBhrs_4,7.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6740: bhagavati hanta rater lave 'py udīrṇe // RBhrs_4,7.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6743: yā prāyo jāyate seyaṃ jugupsā prāyikī matā // RBhrs_4,7.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6746: vasann eṣa klinno jaḍa-tanur ahaṃ mātur udare /
GR14ruphbr_u:6748: tad asmin kaṃsāre kuru mayi kṛpā-sāgara kṛpām // RBhrs_4,7.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6753: kṣiptās te smṛtim ākalayya naraka-dhvaṃsinn iha prāṇimaḥ // RBhrs_4,7.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6754: labdha-kṛṣṇa-rater eva suṣṭhu pūtaṃ manaḥ sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6755: kṣubhyaty ahṛdy aleśe 'pi tato 'syāṃ raty-anugrahaḥ // RBhrs_4,7.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6757: prācāṃ matānusāreṇa tad vijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_4,7.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6758: amī pañcaiva śāntādyā harer bhakti-rasā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6759: eṣu hāsyādayaḥ prāyo bibhrati vyabhicāritām // RBhrs_4,7.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6765: mitratvaṃ śātravatvaṃ ca rasānām abhidhīyate // RBhrs_4,8.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6767: adbhutaś caiṣa prītādiṣu catuḥṣv api // RBhrs_4,8.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6768: dviṣann asya śucir yuddhavīro raudro bhayānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6770: vairī śucir yuddha-vīro raudraś caika-vibhāvakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6771: preyasas tu śucir hāsyo yuddha-vīraḥ suhṛd-varāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6772: dviṣo vatsala-bībhatsa-raudrā bhīṣmaś ca pūrvavat // RBhrs_4,8.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6774: śatruḥ śucir yuddha-vīraḥ prīto raudraś ca pūrvavat // RBhrs_4,8.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6775: śucer hāsyas tathā preyān suhṛd asya prakīrtitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6777: prāhur eke 'sya suhṛdaṃ vīra-yugmaṃ pare ripum // RBhrs_4,8.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6778: mitraṃ hāsyasya bībhatsaḥ śuciḥ preyān savatsalaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6779: pratipakṣas tu karuṇas tathā prokto bhayānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6780: adbhutasya suhṛd vīraḥ pañca śāntādayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6781: pratipakṣo bhaved asya raudro bībhatsa eva ca // RBhrs_4,8.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6782: vīrasya tv adbhuto hāsyaḥ preyān prītis tathā suhṛt /
GR14ruphbr_u:6783: bhayānako vipakṣo 'sya kasyacic chānta eva ca // RBhrs_4,8.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6785: vairī hāsyo 'sya sambhoga-śṛṅgāraś cādbhutas tathā // RBhrs_4,8.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6786: raudrasya karuṇaḥ prokto vīraś cāpi suhṛd-varaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6787: pratipakṣas tu hāsye 'sya śṛṅgāro bhīṣaṇo 'pi ca // RBhrs_4,8.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6790: bībhatsasya bhavec chānto hāsyaḥ prītis tathā suhṛt /
GR14ruphbr_u:6791: śatruḥ śucis tathā preyān jñeyā yuktyā pare ca te // RBhrs_4,8.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6793: kathitebhyaḥ pare ye syus te taṭasthāḥ satāṃ matāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6794: suhṛdā miśraṇāṃ samyag āsvādaṃ kurute rasam // RBhrs_4,8.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6795: dvayos tu miśraṇe sāmyaṃ duḥśakaṃ syāt tulā-dhṛtam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6796: tasmād aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena melanaṃ viduṣāṃ matam // RBhrs_4,8.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6797: bhaven mukhyo 'tha vā gauṇo raso 'ṅgī kila yatra yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6798: kartavyaṃ tatra tasyāṅgaṃ suhṛd eva raso budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6800: aṅgatāṃ yatra suhṛdo mukhyā gauṇāś ca bibhrati // RBhrs_4,8.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6803: tasya padāmbuja-yugalaṃ kiṃ vā saṃvāhayiṣyāmi // RBhrs_4,8.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6816: atra mukhya eva mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6825: yas tu dṛṣṭyā padminīnām api suṣṭhu hṛṇīyate // RBhrs_4,8.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6829: na tṛpyati na sarvataḥ sukha-maye samādhāv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:6830: na siddhiṣu ca lālasāṃ vahati labhyamānāsv api
GR14ruphbr_u:6831: prabho tava padārcane param upaiti tṛṣṇāṃ manaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6835: adharaṃ piñcha-cūḍasya calāś culūkayanti yāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6838: dṛśos taralitair alaṃ vraja nivṛtya mugdhe vrajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6839: vitarkayasi māṃ yathā na hi tathāsmi kiṃ bhūriṇā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6851: vatsān avati vatso me hanta santapyate manaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6854: putras te navanīta-piṇḍam atanuṃ muṣṇan mamāntar-gṛhād
GR14ruphbr_u:6856: ity uktā kula-vṛddhayā suta-mukhe dṛṣṭiṃ vibhugna-bhruṇi
GR14ruphbr_u:6857: smerāṃ nikṣipatī sadā bhavatu vaḥ kṣemāya goṣṭheśvarī // RBhrs_4,8.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6865: kevale vatsale nāsti mukhyasya khalu sauhṛdam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6866: ato 'tra vatsale tasya natarāṃ likhitāṅgatā // RBhrs_4,8.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6871: sandeśam arpayati tanvi mad-artham eva // RBhrs_4,8.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6874: svasāsmi tava nirdaye paricinoṣi na tvaṃ kutaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6877: kṛtaṃ smitam abhijñayā guru-puras tadā rādhayā // RBhrs_4,8.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6881: smara-smerām ārād dṛśam asakalām arpayati ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6882: bhujām aṃse sakhyuḥ pulakini dadhānaḥ phani-nibhām
GR14ruphbr_u:6887: tenaiṣām aṅgitā vyaktā mukhyānāṃ ca tathāṅgatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6888: tathāpy alpa-viśeṣāya kiñcid eva vilikhyate // RBhrs_4,8.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6897: māṃ yoddhuṃ milasi puraḥ kathaṃ viśāla /
GR14ruphbr_u:6899: śrīdāmā gaṇayati re tvam atra ko 'si // RBhrs_4,8.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6909: yaṣṭyā durbalayā vijitya purataḥ solluṇṭham udgāyataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6911: kṛṣṇaḥ phulla-kapolakaḥ pulakavān visphāra-dṛṣṭir babhau // RBhrs_4,8.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6913: evam anyasya gauṇasya jñeyā kavibhir aṅgitā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6914: tathā ca mukhya-gauṇānāṃ rasānām aṅgatāpi ca // RBhrs_4,8.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6915: so 'ṅgī sarvātigo yaḥ syān mukhyo gauṇo 'thavā rasaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6916: sa evāṅgaṃ bhaved aṅgi-poṣī sañcāritāṃ vrajan // RBhrs_4,8.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6918: eka eva bhavet sthāyī raso mukhyatamo hi yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6919: rasās tad-anuyāyitvād anye syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6921: rasānāṃ samavetānāṃ yasya rūpaṃ bhaved bahu /
GR14ruphbr_u:6922: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ saṅcāriṇo matāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6924: puṣṇan nija-prabhuṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇas tatraiva līyate // RBhrs_4,8.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6926: kuñcatā nija-nāthena gauṇo 'py aṅgitvam aśnute // RBhrs_4,8.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6927: mukhyas tv aṅgatvam āsādya puṣṇann indram upendravat /
GR14ruphbr_u:6930: bhāty eva na tu līnaḥ syād eṣa sañcāri-gauṇavat // RBhrs_4,8.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6931: aṅgī mukhyaḥ svam atrāṅgair bhāvais tair abhivardhayan /
GR14ruphbr_u:6932: sajātīyair vijātīyaiḥ svatantraḥ san virājate // RBhrs_4,8.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6933: yasya mukhyasya yo bhakto bhaven nitya-nijāśrayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6934: aṅgī sa eva tatra syān mukhyo 'py anyo 'ṅgatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,8.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6937: tad vinā tasya sampāto vaiphalyāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_4,8.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6941: janayaty eva vairasyaṃ rasānāṃ vairiṇā yutiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6955: śiraḥ kṛṣṇa tavāghrāya vihariṣye tatas tvayā // RBhrs_4,8.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6963: adyaiva dūti tena tvaṃ mayā ramaya mādhavam // RBhrs_4,8.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6965: ciraṃ jīveti saṃyujya kācid āśīrbhir acyutam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6969: kvacid bhavet tataḥ suṣṭhu vairasyāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_4,8.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6977: smaryamāṇatayāpy uktau sāmyena vacane 'pi ca // RBhrs_4,8.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6980: ity ādiṣu na vairasyaṃ vairiṇo janayed yutiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6983: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate
GR14ruphbr_u:6984: bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6985: yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate
GR14ruphbr_u:6986: mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati // RBhrs_4,8.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6987: bādhyatvam atra śāntasya śucer utkarṣa-varṇanāt // RBhrs_4,8.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6995: sukhātmā bhavatī rādhe brahma-vidyeva rājate // RBhrs_4,8.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6997: rādhā śāntir ivonnidraṃ nirnimeṣekṣaṇaṃ ca mām /
GR14ruphbr_u:6998: kurvatī dhyāna-lagnaṃ ca vāsayaty adri-kandare // RBhrs_4,8.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7010: yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī // RBhrs_4,8.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7013: tatrāsmākaṃ yad-avadhi sakhe dṛṣṭir eṣā niviṣṭā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7014: satyaṃ brūmas tad-avadhi bhaved indum indīvaraṃ ca
GR14ruphbr_u:7024: saṅgatiḥ kila mukhyasya vairasyāyaiva jāyate // RBhrs_4,8.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7027: yāmi kāśya-gṛhaṃ yūnā manaḥ śyāmena me hṛtam // RBhrs_4,8.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7031: sadānandaṃ paraṃ brahma dṛṣṭyā seviṣyate mayā // RBhrs_4,8.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7037: aṅgayor aṅginaḥ puṣṭyai bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7040: gariṣṭho 'yaṃ keśī girivad iti me vellati manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7042: khalaṃ kṣundan kuryāṃ vrajam atitarāṃ śālinam aham // RBhrs_4,8.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7045: kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe ity ādi (BRS 4.8.31) // RBhrs_4,8.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7048: mitho vairāv api dvau yau bhāvau dharma-sutādiṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:7049: kālādi-bhedat prākaṭyaṃ tau vindantau na duṣyataḥ // RBhrs_4,8.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7051: na syād ity ujjvale rādhā-kṛṣṇayor darśitaṃ purā // RBhrs_4,8.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7056: daityācāryās tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo
GR14ruphbr_u:7057: gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣigaṇā dhyāna-muṣṇāsram ambāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7058: romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ sureśā
GR14ruphbr_u:7059: lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśaḥ prekṣya raṅge mukundam // RBhrs_4,8.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7061: svasmin dhūrye 'py amānī śiśuṣu gari-dhṛtāv udyateṣu smitāsyas
GR14ruphbr_u:7062: thūtkārī dadhni visre praṇayiṣu vivṛta-prauḍhir indre 'ruṇākṣaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7063: goṣṭhe sāśrur vidūne guruṣu hari-makhaṃ prāsya kampaḥ sa pāyād
GR14ruphbr_u:7064: āsāre sphāra-dṛṣṭir yuvatiṣu pulakī bibhrad adriṃ vibhur vaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7069: rasā eva rasābhāsā rasa-jñair anukīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7070: syus tridhoparasāś cānu-rasāś cāparasāś ca te /
GR14ruphbr_u:7071: uttamā madhyamāḥ proktāḥ kaniṣṭhāś cety amī kramāt // RBhrs_4,9.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7074: śāntādayo rasā eva dvādaśoparasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7077: tathā bībhatsa-bhūmādeḥ śānto hy uparaso bhavet // RBhrs_4,9.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7080: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭe tad evādya purāṇa-puruṣe tvayi // RBhrs_4,9.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7085: tvāṃ vinā kim api nāparam asti // RBhrs_4,9.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7113: dvayor ekatarasyaiva ratir yā khalu dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:7114: yān ekatra tathaikasya sthāyinaḥ sā virūpatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7121: ahnāya kāpi gaitri aṅkuritām ayāsīt // RBhrs_4,9.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7123: etasyāḥ prāg-abhāve tu śucir noparaso bhavet // RBhrs_4,9.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7130: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu vadanty uparasaṃ śucim // RBhrs_4,9.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7133: latā-paśu-pulindīṣu vṛddhāsv api sa vartate // RBhrs_4,9.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7138: ratim iha pallavitāṃ hṛdi vyanakti // RBhrs_4,9.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7146: harer dṛk-cāpalaṃ vīkṣya sahajaṃ yā vighūrṇate // RBhrs_4,9.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7165: kailāsa-vāsinīṃ dāsīṃ kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā bhajasva mām // RBhrs_4,9.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7168: kaṭī-kaṇḍūtir ity ādyaṃ grāmyatvaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,9.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7170: kiṃ naḥ phaṇi-kiśorīṇāṃ tvaṃ puṣkara-sadāṃ sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7173: prakaṭa-prārthanādiḥ syāt sambhogādes tu dhṛṣṭatā // RBhrs_4,9.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7176: tvaṃ vidagdho 'si govinda kiṃ vā vācyam ataḥ param // RBhrs_4,9.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7177: evam eva tu gauṇānāṃ hāsādīnām api svayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:7181: rasā hāsyādayaḥ sapta śāntaś cānurasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7192: evam evātra vijñeyā vīrāder apy udāhṛtiḥ // RBhrs_4,9.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7193: aṣṭāv amī taṭastheṣu prākaṭyaṃ yadi bibhrati /
GR14ruphbr_u:7197: hāsādīnāṃ tadā te 'tra prājñair aparasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7200: kṛṣṇam ārāj jarāsandhaḥ solluṇṭham ahasīn muhuḥ // RBhrs_4,9.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7202: uttamās tu rasābhāsāḥ kaiścid rasatayoditāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7204: bhāvāḥ sarve tad-ābhāsā rasābhāsāś ca kecana /
GR14ruphbr_u:7205: amī prokta-rasābhijñaiḥ sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7214: iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇo nāma caturtho vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7218: Thank you for using a Gaudiya Grantha Mandir text. Remember,
GR14ruphbr_u:7219: GGM is an open source network.
GR14ruphbr_u:7220: So, give back to the world community of scholars by notifying us of any mistakes or variant readings,
GR14ruphbr_u:7221: either by emailing us directly or by posting in the GGM forums. And if you are working closely on this or any other text,
GR14ruphbr_u:7222: please send us your edited version.
GR14ruphbr_u:7224: please help by donating to the cause.
GR14ruphbr_u:7225: The work done here will last for generations.
